Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
This anomalous site can be explored by a hero, to recover research data and reveal the secrets of the Star Union.
该异常地点可由一名英雄进行探索，恢复研究数据并揭露星际联盟的秘密。
An ancient terraforming station that still seems powered.
一座古老的改造站似乎仍在运作。

We've located a structure deep in the earth, connected to a maze of vertical shafts. This is odd, because the Terratech logo on the factility indicates it was a terraforming station.[br/]More remarkable, the facility is still powered. We should take time to review their ecological assessment logs to know how to proceed safely.
我们在地底深处发现了一栋建筑，这里与一片迷宫般的竖井相连。这很奇怪，因为设施上的泰拉科技标志说明这是一座改造站。[br/]但更令人感到惊讶的是，这个设施居然仍在运作。我们应该花些时间看看他们的生态评估日志，了解一下如何才能安全地运转这个设施。
Terratech is a corporation within the Star Union specialized in bio manipulation.

In the facility's control center, we encountered the remains of human scientists. Further inside the complex, we uncovered mummified Dvars encased in their still upright DV-R suits. Computer monitors exposed why there was a Dvar presence here. They modified the terraforming instrumentation to force valuable minerals to the surface for easy collection. Clearly, something went terribly wrong and cost them their lives.
我们在这个设施的控制中心里发现了许多人类科学家的遗骸，当我们向深处走去时，还发现了许多早已干枯了的矮人尸体，他们依旧穿着那身挺直的 DV-R 套服。我们从电脑的监视器中知道了为什么这里会有矮人的身影：他们修改了改造仪器，将珍贵的矿物强行逼出地表以便他们采集。显然，这里发生了一些十分严重的事故，让他们付出了生命的代价。
Dvar are a player race of squat humanoids miners organized in consortia. DV-R suits are the environmental suits worn by the Dvar from which they take their name.
Investigate and Complete the Agitation Program
Agitating geothermal activity in the sector.
正在激活该区域的地热活动。

Our experts identified the error in the mineral extraction program, and installed a patch. The Dvar were impatient and didn't factor in the network's maximum power capacity. We activated the repaired device. The earth trembled, filling the instruments with geothermal energy. The sector is now a volcanic landscape covered with valuables, and a rich vein of mineral wealth lies ready for our collection team.
我们的专家在矿物提取程序中发现了一个错误并安装了一个补丁程序。矮人是一群没有耐心的种族，他们没有将网络最大功率容量的因素考虑在内。我们启动了修理完毕的设备。一时间，大地开始颤动，仪器里充满了地热能量。现在，该区域已经变成了一片覆盖着各种珍贵资源的火山地貌，丰富的矿脉资源出现在了我们采集队的面前。

We thought we correctly fixed the problem, so we activated the instrument. Then the whole complex began to rock violently. We were forced to flee as geothermal energy consumed the facility and ravaged the sector. We barely escaped being cooked alive. As the smoke cleared, we surveyed a new volcanic landscape. Unfortunately, the process was incomplete and only a few minerals surfaced.
我们以为我们成功解决了问题，于是便启动了仪器。突然，整个建筑开始剧烈晃动起来。地热能量融化了整栋设施并且破坏了这片区域，我们被迫逃离了这里，差一点就被活活煮熟了。烟雾散去后，我们发现了一片全新的火山地貌。不幸的是，改造过程并不完整，只有少数矿物浮出了地面。
Complete the Agitation Program according to Dvarian protocol
根据矮人的方案完成激活计划
Agitating geothermal activity in the sector…
正在激活该区域的地热活动…

The mummies brought shame to their Consortium. Dvar Agitation Protocol is not new tech, but it requires patient and skilled application. We corrected the fool's mistakes and activated the operation. Shafts of geothermal energy burned away the impurities in the super-heated ground. The sector is a fine volcanic landscape now, strewn with the glittering wealth once buried beyond our reach. The Director will be delighted at this new fortune and that we brought the Dvar honor once again.
这些干瘪的矮人给他们的财团带来了耻辱。矮人的激活计划并不是什么新鲜的技术，但需要耐心和熟练的技术应用。我们修正了这蠢货的错误并重新激活了他们的操作。一股股地热能量涌了出来，烧毁了滚烫地面上的杂质。现在，这个区域变成了一片美丽的火山地貌，散布着各种曾经深埋地底而使我们无法触及的财富。领袖将会很开心看到这些新的财富，也肯定会对我们再次为矮人带来了荣誉而感到欣慰。

A Consortium is a Dvar faction, their 'clan' as it were. Dvar Agitation Protocol is a name for the in lore name for such an operation.
Director - title of a Dvar leader, the player character if they are playing a Dvar is also a Director.
Reprogram the facility to fertilize the sector instead
重新编写设施程序，为该区域施肥
Reprogramming the facility to fertilize the sector…
正在重新编写设施程序，为该区域施肥…

It has been slow going, but we successfully restored the terraforming capabilities of this facility. The dead were removed from the complex and buried in a grave alongside their greed. The scent of fertile greenery fills the air. Life blooms anew on this lush landscape, capable of sustaining life for centuries to come.
虽然进展缓慢，但我们还是成功恢复了这个设施的环境改造能力。我们将那些死者移出了建筑群，把他们和他们的贪婪一同埋葬在了坟墓里。空气中弥漫着茂盛绿叶的香味，生命在这片苍翠繁茂的土地上重新绽放，足以延续几个世纪。
Let Biomancers fix the facility to fertilize the sector
让生化师修复此设施，为该区域施肥
正在对该区域进行开垦和施肥

Our Biomancers made short work of the Dvar intrusion, clearing away the bodies and planting them in the earth to serve as fertilizer alongside the terraforming apparatus. A thick green paradise springs out of the blasted ruin of their greed. Our spirits swell with joy at the sound of songbirds lodging in the verdant canopy of young saplings. Life will thrive here for generations to come.
我们的生化师很快便解决了矮人的入侵，他们将清理出来的尸体埋入土壤之中作为肥料与改造仪器一同使用。很快，一座苍翠欲滴的绿色天堂从矮人贪婪的废墟中冒了出来。鸟儿在翠绿的幼枝上啼叫，我们的灵魂也因这歌声而充满喜悦。生命将在这里世代蓬勃兴旺。
Biomancers - Amazon bio manipulation experts, named after the tier 2 support unit.
区域地表已改造为荒地
区域地表已改造为真菌
区域地表已改造为真菌森林！
An exposed mineral vein has appeared nearby
附近暴露出了一条矿脉
A Geothermal Instability has appeared nearby
The sector has gained a new feature
Herald refers to Herald of Oblivion, the tier 4 Psynumbra unit.
一个未曾被发现过的赛努布拉仪式大厅。
Psynumbra is a secret technology that involves gaining Psionic power from intense emotion and sacrifice, mostly painful ones.

We’ve located an underground chamber. Gruesome regalia litters the chambers. Past the bodies, strange artifacts, and signs of a struggle in the center chamber; a sacrificial victim is strapped onto a rectangular stone altar. The victim appears to be maimed by a powerful compressive force.[br/]Clearly, a Psynumbra ritual happened here.
我们发现了一个地下室，房间里刻满了一些可怕的标记。除了满地横倒的尸体、诡异的神器和曾经发生过打斗的迹象之外，一名遭到献祭的受害者被绑在一块矩形的石头祭坛上，似乎被某种强大的力量挤压至死。[br/]显然，这里曾经举行过赛努布拉仪式。
Psynumbra is a secret technology that involves gaining Psionic power from intense emotion and sacrifice, mostly painful ones.

Our preliminary forensic investigation indicates that a powerful artifact activated this ritual. A strangely-shaped knife found in the body is laced with complex but dormant Psynumbra tech. We believe we can ‘reawaken’ the knife, and possibly re-enact the ritual. Judging from the stress fractures on the sacrificial body, some otherworldly entity erupted from the altar, using the tortured body as some kind of gate. The knife is key to open that gate.
经过我们的初步调查发现，是某种强大的神器激活了这个仪式。我们在尸体上发现了一把形状奇特的匕首，匕首中注入了复杂但处于休眠状态的赛努布拉技术。我们认为，我们能“重新唤醒”这把匕首，或许还能再现这一仪式。从被献祭之人尸体的骨头断裂程度来看，祭坛上出现了某种来自另一世界的实体，用这具扭曲的尸体作为某种入口。而这把匕首就是打开那道入口的钥匙。
Psynumbra is a secret technology that involves gaining Psionic power from intense emotion and sacrifice, mostly painful ones.
Reawaken the knife by conducting the ritual
举行仪式，重新唤醒这把匕首
Comitting the rites of the Herald according to Psynumbra tradition…
正在根据赛努布拉的传统举行先驱仪式…
Psynumbra is a secret technology that involves gaining Psionic power from intense emotion and sacrifice, mostly painful ones. Herald refers to Herald of Oblivion, the tier 4 Psynumbra unit.
As the cruel fiend fell, the ritual dagger sopped up its darkness. A scrawl of foul symbols line the alien blade, radiating an unprecedented power.[br/]The translated runes read: "A soul for a soul."
当残忍的恶魔倒下时，仪式匕首吸尽了它的黑暗。一堆潦草的邪恶标志出现在了这把异星匕首之上，散发出一股前所未有的力量。[br/]我们翻译了那些神秘的符文，上面写着：“一命换一命。”
The quote is meant to allude to the dagger requiring a kill before it can summon a herald.

We Psynumbra know suitable sacrifices, lost and innocent. We strapped him to the altar and chanted chilling curses. His cries of terror delighted us. We brandished the knife over him, following the liturgy etched across the altar’s surface.[br/]An ethereal claw snatched the blade, plunging it into the victim's chest. We froze in delicious terror. An abyssal tear formed from the sacrifice’s mortal wound. Climbing from its hellish gate, a Herald of Oblivion now eyes us with covetous malice.
我们赛努布拉人知道付出适当的牺牲。我们把他绑在祭坛上，念诵着冰冷的咒语，他在恐惧中发出的哭喊让我们心情愉悦。我们依照祭坛表面上刻印的祷文将匕首在他身上来回挥舞。[br/]突然，一只虚无缥缈的爪子抓住了匕首并插进了他的胸膛。我们怔在了原地，感受着令人愉悦的恐惧。献祭者胸口上致命的伤口撕裂成了一条深渊的裂缝，遗忘先驱从地狱之门中爬了出来，贪婪而邪恶的眼睛死死地盯住我们。
Herald of Oblivion is a tier 4 Psynumbra unit. Psynumbra is a secret technology that involves gaining Psionic power from intense emotion and sacrifice, mostly painful ones.

A Herald of Oblivion perches atop the heap of viscera on the altar, clutching the knife greedily in its shadowy claws. It eyes us hungrily. Shame it won’t serve us, but that artifact is ours now. Its guardian must be eliminated.
遗忘先驱站在祭坛中的一堆内脏之上，贪婪地用它那幽暗的爪子紧握着那把匕首，饥渴地凝视着我们。可惜的是，它不愿为我们效命，但那个神器现在是我们的了，我们必须消灭这个守护着它的生物。
Herald of Oblivion is a tier 4 Psynumbra unit.
Attempt to recreate the ritual with the knife
使用匕首尝试重现仪式

We strapped a man to the altar. It was just a test. Together we chanted the foul language scrawled across the altar. Lights flickered. Laughing nervously, we brandished the knife over him, following the ritual's liturgy.[br/]An ethereal claw snatched the blade, plunging it into our man's chest. A black pit formed in the depths of his deathblow. Emerging from the shadowy carnage, a Herald of Oblivion stares at us with vicious malice for our casual mockery.
我们将一个男人绑上了祭坛，只是为了做一次实验而已。我们一起吟唱着祭坛上潦草的邪恶祷文。灯光忽明忽暗，映照着我们紧张的笑脸。我们按照仪式祷文的指示将匕首在他身上来回挥舞。[br/]突然，一只虚无缥缈的爪子抓住了匕首并插进了那个人的胸膛。接着，他致命的伤口变成了一个黑色的深洞。一名遗忘先驱从幽暗的阴影中浮现出来，它带着邪恶的神情凝视着我们，仿佛在嘲笑我们不假思索的拙劣模仿。

A Herald of Oblivion perches atop the heap of viscera on the altar, clutching the knife greedily in its shadowy claws. Only we can be entrusted with a power like that knife. The creature that guards it must be destroyed.
遗忘先驱站在祭坛中的一堆内脏之上，贪婪地用它那幽暗的爪子紧握着那把匕首。只有我们才能被赋予像那把匕首一般的力量，我们必须消灭这个守护着它的生物。
Comitting the rites of the Herald…

As the cruel fiend fell, the ritual dagger sopped up its darkness. A scrawl of foul symbols line the alien blade, radiating an unprecedented power.[br/]The translated runes read: "A soul for a soul."[br/]Was it really worth the cost?
当残忍的恶魔倒下时，仪式匕首吸尽了它的黑暗。一堆潦草的邪恶标志出现在了这把异星匕首之上，散发出一股前所未有的力量。[br/]我们翻译了那些神秘的符文，上面写着：“一命换一命。”[br/]这真的值得吗？

We strapped a man to the altar, laughing. We didn't expect it to work. We chanted foul words, and made the strange signs. Lights flickered. Laughing nervously, we held the knife over the victim following the ritual. Then the ritual knife exploded. A shadowy creature tore through the poor man's body. The artifact is ruined and something horrific erupted from the gore, fleeing into the inky cloak of night. Oh gods! What have we unleashed?
我们笑着将一个男人绑上祭坛，根本没把这件事情当真。我们吟唱着邪恶的祷文，画着一些奇奇怪怪的符号。灯光忽明忽暗，映照着我们紧张的笑脸，我们按照仪式指示将匕首在他身上来回挥舞。突然，仪式匕首竟然炸裂开来，一个幽暗的生物撕裂了那个可怜人的身体。神器遭到了毁坏，那个人的伤口中冒出了某种可怕的东西，遁入了漆黑的夜色之中。噢，天啊！我们释放了什么？
Destroy this unsettling place on the double
迅速摧毁这个令人不安的地方
正在净化这个邪恶之地…

Better to purge the planet of this site of horror than to entertain Psynumbra darkness. The charges ignited; rubble rained down. An unsettling purple smog rose from the crater.[br/]We held our breath in the gloom, until a less-disciplined soldier laughed nervously. The troops immediately relaxed, happy to bury this mission.
净化这个地方的恐惧，不能让赛努布拉的黑暗遍布整个星球。炸药发出一声巨响，碎石如雨点般落下。一股令人不安的紫色烟雾从陨坑中升起。[br/]我们在阴暗中屏住呼吸，直到一名纪律涣散的士兵紧张地笑了起来。整支部队顿时放松了下来，大家脸上纷纷露出欣慰的神情，任务完成了。
Phoenix Walker is a tier 3 Promethean Unit.
The dug-up chassis of a Phoenix Walker with the remains of two lovers inside.
一架从地底挖出来的凤凰行者，里面躺着一对恋人的遗体。
Phoenix Walker is a tier 3 Promethean Unit.

Buried in a rockslide, our survey crew discovered the toe of a boot for a large mech. Underground imaging reveals a complete military walker. Specifically concealed beneath centuries of natural detritus caused by years of erosion and shifting gravel is an antique model Promethean Phoenix Walker, as if deliberately concealed from onlookers. There are no known records of ancient Promethean activity on this planet. The find is quite a mystery to all of us.
在一片岩石滑坡中，我们的调查人员发现了一个大型机械装置的脚部。地下成像显示这是一架完整的军用凤凰行者。由于多年的侵蚀和砾石移动，已有数百年历史的天然碎石之下藏着一个古老的圣火凤凰行者模型，好像是专门隐藏起来不让过路人看见。这个星球上暂时还没有任何与古代圣火活动有关的记录，因此这个发现给我们所有人都留下了一个疑惑。
Phoenix Walker is a tier 3 Promethean Unit.

We found two Purifier bodies in the cockpit, locked together as if in a dying embrace. Inspecting the system logs, it appears they were lovers. We were able to scan the system logs. There are dozens of letters of affection between these two. The whole camp is reading them with great amusement. Ritual courtship in the past has changed from the almost flippant way lovers couple today. They used the walker as a means of escape from the front.
我们在驾驶舱里发现了两具净化者的尸体，他们就像濒死前给予对方最后的拥抱一般，紧紧地贴在一起。从系统日志中可以看出，他们似乎是一对恋人。我们扫描了系统日志后发现，两人之间曾经往来过几十封情书，我们整个营地都沉浸在了这些充满爱意的词句之中。曾经传统的求爱仪式到了今天已变得如此轻率。可以看出，他们正是驾驶这辆凤凰行者逃离了前线。
Purifier is the rank/name given to foot soldiers of the Promethean secret tech, armed with flamethrowers and tasked to cleanse worlds by fire.
Rebury the lovers with their belongings in the Walker
把这对恋人和他们东西与凤凰行者一同再次掩埋
Reburying the lovers and the Walker…
正在重新埋葬这对恋人和凤凰行者…

The whole camp agrees. We decided to respect the dead by burying them here as we found them. They even built a monument with a digital display chip containing the records of the two lovers letters to one another. One of the surveyors built a rock fountain and they even put up a couple park benches. The whole camp is atypically chipper.
我们所有人都同意要尊重死者，并将他们重新埋回了我们发现他们的地方。他们甚至建造了一座配有数码显示芯片的纪念碑，用来展示这对恋人写给彼此的情书。其中一个调查员用石头搭建了一座喷泉，甚至还在旁边放了一张双人公园椅。所有人的心情都异常愉悦。
Get rid of the remains and refurbish the Walker
丢掉尸体并修理凤凰行者
Throwing out the couple's remains and refurbishing the Walker…
正在处理恋人的遗体并修理凤凰行者…

We tossed the bodies into a quarry and dug out the antique mech. The unit is in fine working order and, with a few mods, it's as good as a fully functional modern version of the Phoenix Walker. What great fortune! We scored a powerful new toy.
我们把尸体扔进了一个采石场，然后把那架古老的机械挖了出来。修理工作有条不紊地展开，经过一系列修改之后，一架恢复了运转的现代凤凰行者出现在了我们面前。这是多么巨大的一笔财富啊！我们获得了一件强大的新武器。
Phoenix Walker is a tier 3 Promethean Unit.
Give the ex-Purifiers a proper Promethean cremation and refurbish the Walker
为这对曾经的净化者恋人举办一场隆重的圣火葬礼，然后修理凤凰行者
Promethean is a secret tech specializing in cleansing worlds by fire.
Cremating the lovers to Promethean standards and refurbishing the Walker…
正在以圣火使者的标准火化这对恋人并修理凤凰行者…
Promethean is a secret tech specializing in cleansing worlds by fire.

With the utmost respect to the dead, we removed the bodies and laid them to rest upon the funeral pyre, as is proper since the advent of the Promethean creed. One of the surveyors gave a stirring speech about how their ashes can drift off together. Then we set to work upgrading the Walker. We Prometheans do fine work! It's fully functional now, and ready to serve us at full capacity.
我们怀着对死者崇高的敬意，把尸体放在了火葬堆上，这是圣火使者一直以来的传统。其中一名调查员念诵了一篇激动人心的悼词，宣称他们的骨灰将一起飘散。随后，我们便开始着手升级那架凤凰行者。我们圣火使者都是精通机械的好手！凤凰行者现在已经完全恢复运转了，随时可以为我们效力。
Promethean is a secret tech specializing in cleansing worlds by fire.
原型太空掠夺者竞技场
Spacers were once a subculture within the Star Union based around escapism that featured sub groups of hackers. The Spacers now known by the player are savage raiders who have lost their sanity.
An abandoned Spacer combat arena housing abandoned vehicles and other hardware.
一个废弃的太空掠夺者竞技场中埋藏着废弃的车辆和其他硬件。
Spacers were once a subculture within the Star Union based around escapism that featured sub groups of hackers. The Spacers now known by the player are savage raiders who have lost their sanity.

We've excavated into a large opening littered with rubble. Hidden among the scrap of ruined Spacer vehicles and undetonated explosives, we discovered an arena. While navigating the find, we triggered a holographic projector. A towering figure stood among the wreckage, flickering eerily on and off.
我们挖到了一个布满碎石的巨大洞口，一个竞技场竟然隐藏在一堆废弃的太空掠夺者载具残骸和许多未引爆的炸药之中。我们在调查竞技场时，触发了这里的全息投影仪，一个高大的身影从残垣断壁中站了起来，忽隐忽现，十分诡异。
Spacers were once a subculture within the Star Union based around escapism that featured sub groups of hackers. The Spacers now known by the player are savage raiders who have lost their sanity.
As we approached the figure, a number of the ruined vehicles roared to life, revving their engines as if they intend to attack anyone that gets too close to the holographic core.
当我们向这个身影靠近时时，许多载具残骸突然像拥有了生命一般咆哮起来。它们转动着引擎，仿佛打算攻击任何想要靠近全息核心之人。
不过是一些闹哄哄的破车子，阻止不了我们！

As we blasted apart the last threat, the hologram of the announcer flickered off, giving us one last glimpse at the figure's disappointed expression as it dissipated. Analysis of the arena yielded some surprising insights on complex computing. Our team also salvaged the wrecks of the previously aggressive vehicles.
当我们轰烂了最后一个威胁时，播报员的全息影像闪烁了几下，然后慢慢消散了。我们瞥见那个身影的眼神中透露着失望的神情。我们对竞技场进行了分析，获得了一些有关复杂计算的深刻见解。不仅如此，我们的队伍还回收了不少之前攻击我们的那些载具残骸。

We don't yield to threats of any kind, regardless of whether these vehicles are manned or unmanned. As we expected, as soon as we got too close to the main hologram, the Spacer hardware launched its attack.
不管这些载具是人为操纵还是无人驾驶，我们都不会屈服于任何形式的威胁。正如我们所预料的一样，只要我们一接近全息影像，这些太空掠夺者的载具就会发动攻击。
Spacers were once a subculture within the Star Union based around escapism that featured sub groups of hackers. The Spacers now known by the player are savage raiders who have lost their sanity.
The threatening vehicles revved their engines, and trundled forward as if they are eager to run us down. We have no choice but to dismantle the whole lot.
危险的载具加速转动着引擎向我们冲来，好像十分渴望想将我们撞到在地。我们别无选择，只能把它们全部拆除。
The Spacers are clearly involved... perhaps they can help?
这事肯定跟太空掠夺者脱不了干系…也许他们能帮上忙？
Spacers were once a subculture within the Star Union based around escapism that featured sub groups of hackers. The Spacers now known by the player are savage raiders who have lost their sanity.
Spacers were once a subculture within the Star Union based around escapism that featured sub groups of hackers. The Spacers now known by the player are savage raiders who have lost their sanity.

Involving the Spacers was more productive than we anticipated. They took one long look at the holographic image, and then, with a ferocity typical of their faction, they proceeded to follow the holographic monitor's death-tournament. The Spacers, ever the ruthless gamers, lost many lives, but won the overall death-game, defeating the autonomous vehicles. With wicked grins, they let us keep the loot they won, just happy for the thrill of another game.
联系太空掠夺者比我们想象中更管用。他们先是仔细地观察了一番那个全息影像，然后带着他们特有的凶残与那个全息监控展开了一场死亡锦标赛。哪怕是太空掠夺者这样残忍无情的游戏玩家为了赢得这次死亡游戏的胜利，也仍然付出了很大的代价。不过最后，他们还是战胜了那些自主操控的载具，赢下了比赛。他们将赢来的战利品送给了我们，脸上挂满了邪恶的笑容，为这场刺激的游戏感到兴奋不已。
Spacers were once a subculture within the Star Union based around escapism that featured sub groups of hackers. The Spacers now known by the player are savage raiders who have lost their sanity.
These vehicles are controlled by Synthesis Daemons!
这些载具被合成精灵控制了！
Synthesis is a secret technology related to uploading of conciousness and AI. Daemons are debatably sentient AI unique to Synthesis technology.

From the way these unmanned vehicles behave, Synthesis daemons are at work here. After locating a network port, we managed to locate a single Daemon, sole survivor of a Spacer tournament to the death. We offered it a new vehicle and it has offered its services to us.
从这些无人驾驶的载具行为来看，控制它们的应该是合成的精灵。我们找到了一个网络端口并设法定位到了一个精灵，它是曾经在与太空掠夺者展开的一次死亡竞赛中存活下来的唯一幸存者。我们为它提供了一个新载具，它也愿意为我们效命。

Spacers were once a subculture within the Star Union based around escapism that featured sub groups of hackers. The Spacers now known by the player are savage raiders who have lost their sanity. Daemons are debatably sentient AI unique to Synthesis technology.
Have our Diplomats attempt to resolve the situation
让我们的外交官尝试解决
Diplomats are attempting to speak to the holograph…
外交官正在尝试与全息影像交谈…

After lengthy deliberations and some aide from our technical staff, our diplomats have made contact with a single Synthesis daemon. Victim of a deadly game of elimination, wherein it was made to fight other daemons for Spacer entertainment. It was abandoned once the Spacer's game finished. We offered it a new host vehicle, and it vowed to join our cause.
经过长时间的商议外加一点技术人员的协助，我们的外交官与一个合成精灵取得了联系。它是一个歼灭游戏的受害者，在这个游戏中，它需要与其他精灵战斗来取悦太空掠夺者。当太空掠夺者的游戏结束后，它就被遗弃在了这里。我们为它提供了一个新的主机载具，它许下誓言加入了我们的事业。
Synthesis is a secret technology related to uploading of conciousness and AI. Daemons are debatably sentient AI unique to Synthesis technology.
A cavern full of sculptures built from limbs and mechanical parts.
一个恐怖的洞穴，里面满是用肢体和机械部件建造而成的雕塑。

We discovered a series of concealed caverns near our search of an ancient military testing facility. One cave featured a formation of various body parts in altered states of deterioration. Initial tests on the dead show the flesh remarkably well preserved. Though dead, some of the biomechanics interwoven in this strange construct appear to keep the parts in a kind of grisly stasis.
我们在寻找古代军事试验设施的过程中发现了许多隐蔽的洞穴，其中一个洞穴四处散落着正在不断恶化腐烂的肢体。通过对这些残肢的初步检查，我们发现这些尸肉保存得非常完好。虽然已经处于死亡状态，但某种生物力学维持着这个奇怪的构造物，似乎让这些残肢进入了一种诡异的停滞状态。

At first, we thought the network of body parts to be evidence of a primitive culture, then we were confronted by a female Assembly cave-dweller. She's an antique and atypical of her modern kind, calling herself Groxum. She appears distraught by our intrusion. Groxum demands we restore her "sculpture". She seems unaware of our current era, hearkening from a time when the Star Union had no understanding of the Assembly's morbid instincts.
起初，我们以为这个由身体部位交织而成的构造体是某种原始文化存在的证据，直到我们遇见了一个居住在洞穴中的女半机械人。她的身体构造十分古老，明显与现代的半机械人同族不太一样。她称自己为格罗瑟姆，并且似乎对我们的闯入十分不满，要求我们复原她的“雕塑”。她似乎不知道自己正处于什么时代，我们从星际联盟还未发现半机械人病态本能的那段岁月开始说起，她则在一旁饶有兴致地细细聆听。
Groxum is the name of this particular Reverse Engineer. Assembly are a player race of cyborgs that use biological and mechanical parts in equal measure without regard of traditional morals.
Help to rebuild the sculpture with Assembly experience
运用半机械人的经验帮助她重建雕塑
Assembly are a player race of cyborgs that use biological and mechanical parts in equal measure without regard of traditional morals.
正在帮助格罗瑟姆重建雕塑…
Groxum is the name of this particular Reverse Engineer.

With her sculpture repaired, we hailed her as Assembly. Groxum's auto-vivification routines immediately refreshed. We pieced together her history without disassembling her core storage. She fled oppression from early Star Union dogmatists. They didn't understand her "love" of lifeless organic materials. This is no longer a prejudice among most nonhostile enlightened beings. Her unconventional pastime aside, Groxum managed to conceal herself all the while collecting dead matter. We can learn from her remarkable self-preservation subroutines. We welcome her ingenuity.

我们修好了她的雕塑之后，以半机械人的方式向她打了声招呼，格罗瑟姆的自动复苏程序立即执行了刷新。我们在没有拆开她核心存储器的情况下，重新拼凑起了她以往的故事。原来，她在很早的时候就因忍受不了星际联盟的教条而逃了出来，因为他们无法理解她对那些没有生命的有机材料怀有的独特“爱意”。不过现在，大多数没有敌意的开化物种对这种事情早已司空见惯了。除了她如此不同寻常的过去之外，格罗瑟姆在收集各种死去物质的同时，还设法将自己隐藏了起来。我们可以从她出色的自我保护子程序中学到不少东西，她的聪明才智实在让我们惊讶不已。
Groxum is the name of this particular Reverse Engineer. Assembly are a player race of cyborgs that use biological and mechanical parts in equal measure without regard of traditional morals.
Help to rebuild the morbid sculpture as best you can
竭尽所能重建这个恐怖的雕塑

We followed her instructions, carefully piecing Groxum's statue back together as she wept like a child. She is not hostile, though her affinity for dead things is what forced her into hiding. These days, an Assembly fixated with the dead is normal, but Groxum is from a time when Assembly were secret military tech. She recalled how she was forced to assemble and disassemble her friends. Despite her gruesome backstory, she's eager to join us as "her new friends".
我们按照她的指示小心翼翼地把雕塑重新拼接了起来，格罗瑟姆突然像个孩子一样哭了起来。她并没有敌意，只是对死物的喜爱迫使她躲藏了起来。如今，一个半机械人对于死物的喜爱已经是再正常不过的一件事了，但在格罗瑟姆生活的那个时代，半机械人还只是一种秘密的军事科技。她回忆着自己如何被迫组装并拆解自己的朋友。尽管有着如此可怕的过去，格罗瑟姆仍然希望能够以“新朋友”的身份加入我们。
Assembly are a player race of cyborgs that use biological and mechanical parts in equal measure without regard of traditional morals. Groxum is the name of this particular Reverse Engineer.
The likes of you have no place on this planet!
像你这样的生物在这个星球上没有立足之地！

After examining the remnants of Groxum and her gruesome construction, we're left with more questions than answers. Her body tech is quite old, hailing from early Star Union, when the Assembly were a high-level military secret. There is very little salvageable here, and we may never understand her motives or how Groxum escaped the strict military controls or how she managed to hold herself together for centuries in this desolate hiding place.
在检查了格罗瑟姆的残骸和她的可怕构造之后，我们得到的问题远远多于答案。她的身体所采用的技术相当古老，能够追溯至星际联盟早期，那时的半机械人还只是一个保密级别极高的军事机密。这里基本上没有什么可以回收的了，我们也许永远无法理解她的动机，永远无法知道格罗瑟姆到底是如何逃脱严密的军事控制，也永远无法了解她是如何在这个荒凉之地躲藏了几个世纪。
Groxum is the name of this particular Reverse Engineer. Assembly are a player race of cyborgs that use biological and mechanical parts in equal measure without regard of traditional morals.

Groxum's sculpture appears to serve more purpose than just that of entertainment for this resourceful Assembly hermit. At one point, we threatened Groxum, and she activated a hidden switch to call bio-mechanical constructs to her defense. Clearly she is more than an innocent relic of the past.
格罗瑟姆的雕塑似乎不仅仅是这位足智多谋的半机械人隐士为了打发时间而建造的。我们曾一度威胁格罗瑟姆，但她却激活了一个隐藏的开关，召来了一群生物机械构造体前来保护她。显然，她可不仅仅是某个在过去被人遗弃的无辜者那样简单。
Groxum is the name of this particular Reverse Engineer. Assembly are a player race of cyborgs that use biological and mechanical parts in equal measure without regard of traditional morals.

Groxum and her constructs refuse to leave this place, despite our hostile overtures. Her constructs continue to aide her in the creation of her macabre decorations. Groxum threatens anyone who comes near and believes we are Star Union military researchers. She must be eliminated for us to understand the truth of her strange origin.
尽管我们一再威胁，格罗瑟姆和她的构造体仍然拒绝离开这个地方，她的构造体依然继续帮助她创造那些可怕的装饰。格罗瑟姆警惕着任何接近她的人，并认为我们是星际联盟军事研究员。我们必须消灭她，才能了解有关她奇怪起源的真相。
Groxum is the name of this particular Reverse Engineer.
Syndicate are a player race of noble slavers and organized criminals.
A charge station with an abandoned Syndicate Caravan containing coveted items is uncovered.
一个停放着一支废弃的辛迪加车队的充能站，里面藏有各种珍贵物品。
Syndicate are a player race of noble slavers and organized criminals.

We uncovered a passageway hidden in this ruin. Local legends were correct. This place was once a smuggler's drop. There are sigils from many Syndicate houses emblazoned on decades of stolen goods. The most valuable item appears to be a lockbox containing fine Syndicate armor. We need a little time to examine all the merchandise, but under the laws of salvage it should be ours.
我们在这个废墟中发现了一条暗道。当地传说果然不假，这里的确曾是走私者的藏身之地。许多辛迪加家族的标志刻印在这些埋藏了数十年的赃物上，其中最宝贵的东西似乎是一个上锁的箱子，里面装着一件质量上乘的辛迪加护甲。我们需要一点时间来检查所有的货物，但是根据回收法，这些东西理应是我们的。

Syndicate are a player race of noble slavers and organized criminals.
NOTE: Grammar error fixed, no need to relocalize

As we completed the inventory a voice interrupted our comms. Guild Assassins claim they have us locked in their sights. They claim the goods belong to them. They are threatening to "murder us all" if we don't surrender the armor.
当我们清理完这些货物后，一个声音打断了我们的通讯。公会刺客说他们已经锁定了我们，并且声称这些货物属于他们，威胁说如果我们不交出护甲，他们将把我们“杀个片甲不留”。
Guild assassins are a Tier 2 sniper unit belonging to the Syndicate, they are hired by the houses in lore to deal with clandestine matters.
Call their bluff - make them a better offer
揭穿他们的虚张声势并提出更好的提议
Guild assassins are a Tier 2 sniper unit belonging to the Syndicate, they are hired by the houses in lore to deal with clandestine matters.

No good Syndicate gives into any demands, without first making a counteroffer. These assassins are locally trained and impoverished. Seeing our resources, some expressed a desire to join us. A few energy-cells entice the group to dissemble, and we can acquire these goods that are rightfully ours without a messy skirmish.
没有一个真正的辛迪加人会在没有进行讨价还价的情况下对任何要求作出让步。这些穷困潦倒的刺客只接受过一些当地训练，在看到我们所拥有的资源之后，一些人立马表示想要加入我们。我们只用了一些能量电池就使这个组织分崩离析，如此一来我们就能获得这些理应属于我们的物品而不用发生冲突了。
Syndicate are a player race of noble slavers and organized criminals.
Dive for cover! We'll face them head on!
迅速隐蔽！与他们正面对抗！

The assassins are no more. Clearly, these pretenders never trained under these Syndicate houses they claimed. They are undisciplined. The armor they wanted from the trove bears the insignias of a dozen Syndicate houses. We have dutifully reacquired these treasures, claiming them for a more proper owner: us.
这些刺客被彻底消灭了。显然，这些冒充者从未在他们声称的辛迪加家族中接受过训练，他们只是一群纪律涣散的乌合之众罢了。他们想要得到的那件护甲上印有十几个辛迪加家族的徽章，而我们也名正言顺地获得了这些宝藏，并宣布它们将属于一个更合适的主人：我们。
Syndicate are a player race of noble slavers and organized criminals.
The assassins' threats gave us sufficient warning to allow us to find sufficient cover. Unfortunately, if we wish to keep this trove of contraband, we will need to fight off the marauders.
面对刺客的威胁，我们提前找好了掩护。不幸的是，如果我们想要得到这批走私货物，就必须将这些掠夺者击退。
While the assassins are busy plundering our discovery, we can engage them in good old-fashioned combat.
当刺客正忙于抢夺我们发现的货物时，我们就能以传统的方式向他们发起进攻。
Bribe the assassins to look the other way
贿赂刺客，给他们一些别的东西

These assassins seemed more interested in our energy stores than in the actual armor. Makes us wonder if they planted it there and set up the trap as a way to obtain what they didn't think they could take from us. The armor has seen many owners and served a dozen Syndicate houses. It belongs to us now.
比起这件护甲，这些刺客似乎对我们的能量储存更感兴趣。这让我们不得不怀疑，他们是不是一开始就打算用这种虚张声势声东击西的方法从我们这里拿走他们本不可能拿走的东西。这件护甲曾经多次易主，为十几个辛迪加家族提供过服务。现在，它属于我们了。
Syndicate are a player race of noble slavers and organized criminals.
Trade the Armor to scavenge the rest of the caravan
交出护甲，回收车队剩余的财宝
The assassin thugs are gone. Surrendering the Armor enabled us to obtain the rest of the smuggler's trove. There is plenty for all of us.
那些刺客暴徒离开了，我们交出了那件护甲并取走了剩下的财宝，这些财宝对我们所有人来说也都绰绰有余了。
Remnants of a Redcore mining quarry and prototyping facility for the earliest DV-R Suits.
红芯采矿场的遗迹，最早生产原型 DV-R 防护服的设施。
DV-R suits are the environmental suits worn by the Dvar from which they take their name.

We have located a very old mining facility, from a time when the Star Union first contracted what would become the Dvar. Although the logo is different, the name Redcore is a revered name among the Dvar. It was this conglomerate that first pioneered the use of exosuits.
我们找到了一栋非常古老的矿采设施，早在星际联盟第一次与后来被称为“矮人”的种族签订合约时就已经建立。尽管徽标与现在有所不同，但“红芯”的名号在矮人中还是很受尊敬的，正是这个集团率先使用了机械防护服。
Dvar are a player race of squat humanoids miners organized in consortia.

Delving deeper into the forgotten facilities, we've discovered what appears to be very primitive tech and tools used to weather the most extreme environments. Surprisingly, there's tech here that requires the use of Cosmite, though that element was a secret to the general population of the Star Union. Using our mature understanding of Cosmite, we think we may be able to piece together some of these broken prototypes.
随着我们深入研究这些早已被遗忘了的设施，我们发现了一些似乎非常原始的用来抵御极端环境的技术和工具。令人惊讶的是，其中有一种技术竟然需要使用宇宙合金，而这种元素曾经对星际联盟的普通民众来说一直是一个秘密。利用我们对宇宙合金的成熟认知，我们认为或许能将那些破碎的原型重新拼凑起来。
Use Cosmite to try and complete the prototype
利用宇宙合金尝试拼凑原型
Attempting to renovate the DV-R Suit prototype…
正在尝试修复 DV-R 原型防护服…
DV-R suits are the environmental suits worn by the Dvar from which they take their name.

Eureka! We've managed to successfully repair the prototype and restore mining production. Interestingly, the Dvar encounter suits are highly dependent on Cosmite. Researchers back then still hadn't decided on a name for the enigmatic substance, using strange names like Mysterionium, Energion, Voidinium, and (our favorite) Weirdstuffium. We've learned a lot about this technology, secrets the Dvar kept to themselves. It should help us improve our own production capabilities.
很好！我们已经修复了原型护服并且恢复了矿产。有趣的是，矮人防护服高度依赖宇宙合金，但当时的研究人员还没有决定怎么称呼这一神秘的物质，尽是一些奇奇怪怪的名字，像什么神秘金属、精能、虚空金属和奇异金属（我们最喜欢这个）之类的。我们知道了许多矮人未曾公布的秘密技术，应该能够帮助我们提高生产力。
Dvar are a player race of squat humanoids miners organized in consortia. DV-R suits are the environmental suits worn by the Dvar from which they take their name.

Unfortunately, our attempts to restore the prototype encounter suits all ended in mishap. The ancient scientists used undisciplined methods, and strange terms that no longer can be deciphered. Still, we were able to learn a few things in the endeavor and our engineers have restored the mine to production.
不幸的是，我们没能成功修复原型防护服。这些远古科学家使用的方法杂乱无章，还有一些无法破译的奇怪术语。尽管如此，我们还是在过程中学到一些东西，我们的工程师也已恢复了采矿生产。
Use Cosmite to complete the prototype according to classic DV-R design
根据经典的 DV-R 设计利用宇宙合金拼凑原型
DV-R suits are the environmental suits worn by the Dvar from which they take their name.
Renovating the DV-R Suit prototype according to classic DV-R design…
正在根据经典的 DV-R 设计修复原型防护服…
DV-R suits are the environmental suits worn by the Dvar from which they take their name.

Much honor was earned this day. This ancient encounter suit represents the arduous journey our kin endured. Ironically, we discovered that it was the ignorant Star Union populace that shutdown this facility, spouting paranoid fears about "environmental impact". We restored production. Our whole company is working with renewed zeal, appreciative of the innovative minds that once sought to extract the riches in this place. Thankfully, we live in a more evolved era that appreciates our industry.
今天，我们赢得了许多荣誉。这件古老的防护服代表着我们族人一路走来的艰辛万苦。讽刺的是，我们发现正是那些无知的星际联盟民众迫使这家工厂关门，引发了对“环境影响”的恐惧。随后，我们恢复了生产，所有人都重新燃起了工作的激情，我们感谢那些为我们开创了先河的革新之人。幸运的是，我们现在生活在一个更为先进且我们的产业能够得到欣赏的时代。
Ignore the prototype, clean up the quarry
忽视原型护服，清理采矿场
We all agreed there would be little benefit to wasting our time with primitive Dvar prototypes. Still, the quarry is up and running again and it will bring us immediate benefits.
我们都认为将时间浪费在那些原始的矮人原型套装上没什么作用。不过，采矿场又重新开始运作了，这将为我们带来实实在在的收益。
A Celestian artifact, older than the union itself. There are a select few of these in existence, built by the first of the Celestian faith to test the worth of aspirant Psionics.
一件星神神器，比联盟本身还要古老。现存于世的神器少之又少，它们都是由第一批星神的信徒所创造，用来检验那些胸怀壮志的灵能者价值。
We uncovered a shard of some sort, it hums with a soothing energy, burning bright like the sun yet giving off only a soft warmth. It is clearly some kind of Celestian relic.
我们发现了一块嗡嗡作响的碎片，散发着一种令人舒缓的能量。它像太阳一样明亮，温度却很柔和，显然是某种星神的遗物。

The shard calls out to us, trying to connect with our minds. Celestians never give up anything without a deep and purposeful challenge. The shard pulses with an unimaginable energy... Perhaps it may be forged into a weapon?
碎片召唤着我们，试图与我们的思想相连。在没有进行深刻而坚决的尝试之前，星神信仰者绝不会放弃任何机会。碎片在一股不可思议的能量驱使下跳动着…也许可以把它锻造成某种武器？
Attempt to Contain and Reforge the shard into a weapon
尝试控制碎片并将其重新锻造成武器

A painful, hollow sound shuddered across our minds, torturing our senses as we worked. We steeled ourselves and contained the shard. Our finest craftsmen weaponized the shard. We called the new device... the 'Sunbringer'.
痛苦而空洞的声音在我们的脑海中不断回响，折磨着我们的感官。我们强忍着痛苦控制住了碎片。我们最好的工匠将碎片制成了武器，我们将这个新的装置称为…“太阳使者”。
Sunbringer is the name of the weapon gained from this option, a hammer with the head forged from the Sun Shard.
Our minds were assaulted with an agonizing shriek as we attempted to manipulate the shard. The fragment of pure light evaporated in a blinding flash.
当我们试图操纵碎片时，一声痛苦的尖叫侵入了我们的大脑，那片带着纯净之光的碎片在一道眩目的闪光中蒸发了。
Discipline must prevail, meditate and connect to the shard
集中注意冥想，与碎片建立连接
Meditating in an attempt to connect to the shard
正在冥想并尝试与碎片建立连接

The shard's glow projected signs onto surfaces. A faint hum penetrated our minds. The Celestian artifact accepted our patience, unlocking a vision. We saw a temple. Disciples trained in pure light, until the foul shadow of Psynumbra defiled it. A caretaker cradles the shard, fleeing into cold space. Like a falling star, the disciple's transport crashed here. The shard's light was swallowed by the wreckage of those last remaining that loved it, buried in this strange place... waiting for a hero.
碎片的辉光逐渐冲破表面，一阵微弱的嗡嗡声穿透了我们的思想。这件星神神器接受了我们的耐心，并向我们揭示了一副幻象中的画面。我们看见了一座神庙，信徒在纯净的光芒中训练，直到赛努布拉污秽的暗影玷污了那里。一名看守者捧着碎片，逃进了寒冷的太空之中。然而，他的运输机像是流星一样坠毁在了这里。碎片的光芒被最后剩下的信徒残骸所吞噬，埋葬在了这个奇怪的地方…等待着某个英雄的到来。
Discipline is the key of the Celestian faith, meditate on this artifact
自律是星神信仰的关键，对神器进行冥想

The shard's glow taught us of a lost past. This relic once escaped a terrible fate. Languishing in obscurity, it survived. Now as we are reunited, it blazes anew, penetrating our minds and accentuating our senses. What was lost is restored to come forth at a time when its wisdom is desperately needed. Many ancient teachers left their mark upon this glowing artifact. What we thought was lost is found.
碎片的光芒让我们看到了逝去的过往。这件遗物曾经逃过了一场可怕的命运，它在黑暗中枯萎凋零，但却顽强地幸存了下来。现在，我们再次团聚，它又散发出了新的光芒，穿透了我们的心灵，强化了我们的感官。遗失之物将会在危难之时重新出现。许多远古导师曾经在这个发光的神器上留下了他们的印记。我们找到了一样我们以为早已遗失了的东西。
摧毁这件反叛的星神神器
正在摧毁这件反叛的星神神器…

We sacrificed the Celestian shard to eternal shadow, fated to ever plummet into the abyss. We look to the day when all Celestians are exiled to a realm of never-ending agony, and in their place, nightmares fly.
我们将星神碎片埋葬在了永恒的暗影之中，它注定坠入深渊。我们期待着有那么一天，所有的星神信徒将被放逐到一个充满了无尽痛苦的国度，在他们那里，梦魇永无止境。
A heritor tomb where only drained remain. Not enough souls were stored here to let even the high lord survive the Time of Tribulations.
一个只有枯萎者存在的继承者坟墓。这里没有足够的灵魂，即便是至尊领主也无法在时间的磨难中存活下来。

We unearthed a tomb gate covered with the symbols of an ancient dynasty. Scripture adorned the walls, lovingly etched into stone as we descended further into a chamber devoted to a long-forgotten faith.
我们挖到了一个墓门，上面雕刻着某个远古王朝的符号。当我们深入墓室时，发现房间的石头上刻有许多经文。可以看出，这座坟墓信奉着某种早已被人遗忘的信仰。

Green ghosts drift aimlessly through a concealed passageway. They orbit a multi-armed statue at the back of the hall. At the base of the statue, many artifacts rest. Tributes to the Creator. The Drained guard access to these mysterious relics.
绿色的鬼魂在一条隐蔽的通道里漫无目的地游荡，他们绕着大厅后面的一座多臂雕像来回飘动。雕像的底部放着许多神器，这些都是献给造物主的贡品。一群枯萎者守护着这些神秘的遗物。
Attack the creatures, we must reach that altar
攻击这些生物，我们必须抵达祭坛

As the last Drained fell, we approached the shrine. Each Es'Teq artifact appeared deliberately placed as sacrifice for a being of reverence, dedicated to a particular Es'Teq High Lord named "Oreus Tyre: The Corrupted Savior". An odd name for odd zealots.
当最后一个枯萎者倒下后，我们走进了神殿。神殿里的每一件埃斯特克神器似乎都是为了表达敬意而特意放置的祭品，供奉给一位埃斯特克的至尊领主，被称为“奥瑞厄斯·泰尔：堕落救世主。”多么古怪的名字，多么古怪的狂热者。
To obtain our objective we ready ourselves, determined to eliminate these Drained guardians.
为了达到目标，我们做好了准备，决定消灭这些枯萎者守卫。
Drained swarmed in the tomb, guarding the shrine at the opposite end.
枯萎者涌进了坟墓，守护着他们的神殿。
Use our Heritor expertise to offer the Drained a new life as symbionts
利用继承者的经验学识，为这些枯萎者提供新的共生者生命

The Drained regarded us hungrily, but then cleared the path with humble bows as one by one they recognized our devout intentions. We invoked ancient rights and steeled ourselves, slowly merging our minds with the Drained. Their fragmented memories fixated upon the sacrifice of a High Lord who gave his life so they would not be corrupted by Entropy. Remarkably, through fractured minds they still held him in awe, repeating his name, "Oreus Tyre: The Corrupted Savior."
枯萎者贪婪地看着我们，当他们意识到我们虔诚的意图之后，全都谦卑地躬下了身子，为我们让出了一条道路。我们调用了古老的权利，坚定了我们的意志，逐渐将我们的思想与枯萎者融合在了一起。他们支离破碎的记忆集中在一位至尊领主身上，他献出了自己的生命让这些枯萎者免遭混沌腐蚀。令人惊讶的是，即便在这些破碎的思想中，枯萎者仍然敬畏这位领主，并重复悼念着他的名字，“奥瑞厄斯·泰尔：堕落救世主。”
Drained are humanoids drained of essence, they are damaged and only long to find a new host.
Perhaps we can lure them away with a feast of energy
也许我们可以用一场能量盛宴引诱他们离开
Drained are humanoids drained of essence, they are damaged and only long to find a new host.

We placed an overcharged and leaky vessel near the shrine. The Drained could not resist the leaking glow of Essence. Swarming to contain it, they left their posts unattended. The shrine is dedicated to a Heritor High Lord named "Oreus Tyre: The Corrupted Savior". A strange name for the Heritor, who tend to view their leaders as infallible.
我们在神殿附近放了一个装满了精华但故意没有盖严实的容器。枯萎者无法抗拒精华露出的光亮，他们一拥而上，离开了他们守卫的神殿。这座神殿是为了纪念一位名叫“奥瑞厄斯·泰尔：堕落救世主”的继承者至尊领主而建造的。这个名字对继承者来说十分奇怪，因为继承者认为他们的领袖都是至高无上的。

Drained are humanoids drained of essence, they are damaged and only long to find a new host.
Oreus Tyre is an Es'Teq or Heritor High Lord whom is encountered in the Site "Tyre's Tomb" 'The Corrupted Saviour' is a title given to Oreus Tyre after his sacrifice to cleanse his tomb of the Rot, a corruption of essence that he took into himself. (as explained in Tyre's Tomb)
We found a lush oasis of life, in a remote location, a ruined assembly shuttle lies at the oasis' center, converted into a more permanent home. An ancient Assembly still lingers.
我们在一处偏远之地发现了一片郁郁葱葱的生命绿洲，一架报废的半机械人穿梭机躺在绿洲的中心，仿佛已经成为了某种固定的住所。一位古老的半机械人正在绿洲里游荡。
Our scouts discovered a lush oasis wherein rested a ruined Assembly shuttle, serving as a shelter of sorts. As we investigated, a figure approached: an antique Assembly cyborg.
我们的侦察员发现了一片郁郁葱葱的绿洲。绿洲上停着一架报废的半机械人穿梭机，充当着某种庇护所。当我们调查时，一个人影走了过来，竟然是一名古老的半机械人。

Barely held together with bailing wire and duct tape, the curmudgeon appeared to know nothing of what makes Assembly the Assembly. When he saw us, he shouted, "No! No! I vowed never to see your kind again! War is all you bring. Begone!" With that, he collapsed, as one of his legs gave out beneath him.
这个脾气暴躁的家伙依靠铁丝和胶带勉强拼凑在一起，似乎对“半机械人”这个词汇存在什么误解。他一看见我们就发出了一声大喊：“不！不！我曾经发誓再也不与你们这一族的人相见！你们只会带来战争，快走开！”话音刚落，他就瘫倒在地，一条腿从他身下脱落。
War has come for you regardless, you must fight or be destroyed
无论如何，战争已经找上了门来。你必须战斗，否则将被消灭

As the cyborg fell, his expression was one of peace. We looted the oasis, recovering the cyborg's rifle. We quickly salvaged what we could from this recluse, but much of it is far too old to be usable.
当这名半机械人倒下时，他的表情充满了平静。我们将这片绿洲洗劫一空，还找到了这名半机械人的步枪。很快，我们就从这位隐居的半机械人那里拿走了所有能拿的东西，但其中很多东西都太旧了，根本无法使用。

"Your kind only brings trouble," he said. The old Assembly guardian grabbed his rifle and ducked behind a fallen tree. Several creatures from the native fauna joined the old one to defend the oasis from our intrusion.
“你们族类只会带来痛苦。”老旧的半机械人守护者抓起了他的步枪，闪身躲进了一棵倒下的大树之后。许多当地生物与这名半机械人站在一起，想要阻止我们入侵他们的绿洲。
The cyborg sounded an alarm as we prepared to attack. An assortment of local animals--the sort that use this oasis--come running to aid the strange Assembly guardian.
当我们准备进攻时，半机械人发出了一声警报。生活在这片绿洲中的各种野兽纷纷跑来帮助这个奇怪的半机械人守护者。
Offer to repair him and listen to his story
提议将他修好，并倾听他的故事
正在修理老旧的半机械人…

The cyborg accepted our help after a tense standoff. His name is Thadeus. He was once a regular human soldier at a military research facility. One day he awoke discovering cybernetic implants that altered his perception. He refused to join the military program. He comes from an era when the Assembly were a hushed military secret. He offered us his old weapon, which he claimed had never failed him.
经过紧张的对峙后，这名半机械人终于接受了我们的帮助。他名叫撒迪厄斯，曾经是某个军事研究设施中的一名普通人类士兵。某天，当他醒来后，发现自己被植入了神经机械，所有的感官都发生了变化。撒迪厄斯拒绝加入军事计划，要知道，在他所处的那个时代，半机械人还只是一个不为人知的军事机密。他将一把老旧的武器赠与了我们，并称这把武器从未让他失望。
This one is clearly defective, reassemble him
这个半机械人明显存在缺陷，重新组装他

The cyborg faltered. His body failed him. We ignored his protests. Our reverse engineers quickly get to work, reassembling the defective and antiquated form into a much more useful one. Nothing will be wasted, not even the fallen Assembly's memories. They shall serve to enrich us all and teach us of our collective history.
这个半机械人看起来快要散架了，身体也不听他使唤。我们没有理会他的抗议，逆转工程师很快便开始工作，将这个老旧而破烂的机械重新组装成了一个更有用处的东西。他身上的任何零件都不会被浪费，包括他的记忆。这些记忆将为我们所用，帮助我们了解我们共同的历史。
Reverse Engineers are assembly support units and their main source of labour to reassemble their enemies and citizens alike.

"I will never go back! Leave me alone!" The cyborg cried as he grabbed his rifle and prepared to fight. The oasis filled with native beasts from the area. Apparently, the old curmudgeon has been keeping more than just himself alive out here.
“我绝不会回去！离我远点！”这名半机械人一边大叫着，一边抓起了步枪准备发起攻击。一时间，绿洲里的野兽全都围了过来。显然，这个老旧的半机械人在这里不仅活了下来，还交了不少朋友。
The old cyborg must be cleared out. The infestation of wildlife and any other treasures we find must be harvested. This place has been abandoned for too long.
我们必须处理掉这个老旧的半机械人和这些野兽，拿走我们发现的其他宝藏。这个地方已经被遗弃太久了。
We seek peace like you, but for all of this world, not just ourselves
我们像你一样寻求和平，但不仅仅是为了我们自己，而是为了全世界

The man appreciated our kindness and shared his name as Thadeus. He was a military experiment from the era prior to when the formal Assembly faction had been formed. As a soldier, he was to remove his natural self and replace it with weapons and implants, but the poor man clung too deeply to his humanity. He has even embraced the ways of the Celestians and has offered to join our cause.
这名半机械人十分欣赏我们的善意，并告诉了我们他的名字：撒迪厄斯。他是一项军事试验的牺牲品，那时的半机械人阵营还没有完全建成。他被移除了自己本来的肢体，换上了武器和植入物，但这位可怜的人太执着于他的人性了。他甚至接受了星神信徒的方式，并提出加入我们的事业。
时间异常：拉瓦隆 4 号星
Ravalon-IV is the name of the planet upon which this incident took place.
A time anomaly caused by past Voidtech Experiments has formed a ‘portal’ between the current day and the world’s far past before the cataclysm, where a Kir’ko rebellion is in full swing.
由过去的虚空科技实验所引起的时间异常形成了一道“传送门”，能够从现在穿越回大灾变发生之前的世界。那时正是奇尔寇叛乱的高潮时期。

While excavating a strange, buried inverted ziggurat, we found a truck-sized metallic ring of encoded symbols. In the middle of the ring, rippling like a pool of liquid light, was what can only be a rift in time and space.
当我们在一个诡异的倒置金字塔中进行挖掘时，发现了一个由编码符号组成的金属圆环，大概有一辆卡车那么大。圆环的中央有一片光亮，像是水流般泛起涟漪。没有别的可能，那肯定是某个时空裂缝。

Through the rupture in time, we could view a period of earlier exploration for the Star Union, before the Cataclysm. Visual probes revealed the rift opened to a rebellion of Kir'Ko fighting Promethean Purifiers hired by the Paragon. Some here theorized that if we attacked the right side, it might create a historical time echo and give us an edge in the field even today.
通过这条时空裂缝，我们能够看到大灾变之前早期星际联盟的样子。通过进一步的探测，我们发现裂缝中的时期正值一支奇尔寇叛军奋起反抗一群由完人雇佣的圣火净化者。有人推论说，只要我们站在了正确的一方，那么历史就可能发生改变，甚至能够让我们在今天的战场上获得优势。
选择站在奇尔寇叛军一方

The Paragon Purifiers were routed. Though this rebellion was minor and once tragic, these Kir'ko souls have now survived instead. Their commander offered us support from some of his best troops. They returned with us back through the rift. They are eager to conquer a future full of oppressors.
完人净化者被击败了。虽然这次叛乱规模较小并且曾以悲剧收尾，但这些本该死去的奇尔寇现在却幸存了下来。他们的指挥官将他最优秀的部队交给了我们，并与我们一起从裂缝中走了回来，他们渴望征服一个充满了压迫者的未来。

We entered the rift and discovered the rebels trusted us to fight with them. Apparently, they "felt" that we would come. We must enter the fray and fight with them. This time, with our help, the Paragon will not win this day.
我们进入了裂缝，发现这些奇尔寇叛军十分信任我们。显然，这些奇尔寇早已“感觉”到了我们的到来。我们必须加入战斗，与他们并肩作战。这一次有了我们的帮助，完人将无法取得胜利。
All calculations indicated the optimal solution. We must enter the time rift and protect the Kir'Ko rebels.
所有的计算都指向一个最佳结果：我们必须进入时间裂缝，保护奇尔寇叛军。
我们必须拯救我们的同胞！

This rebellion was once a sad footnote in an erased history. Their commander holds within him many ancient secrets that we had no time to extract. He both mourned and rejoiced in the future. The potential of freedom lives on, but our perpetual dream of restoring the hive queen remains elusive. To help us remember what we have forgotten, he has given his best soldiers as our support.
这次反叛只是一次可悲而又微不足道的运动，存在于一段早已被抹去了的历史之中。他们的指挥官心中藏着许多古老的秘密，但我们没有时间一一了解了。他对未来既抱有希望又感到悲伤，因为我们获得了自由，但重建虫群女皇的永恒梦想却仍然遥不可及。为了帮助我们记起我们早已遗忘之事，他将手下最优秀的士兵交给了我们，作为我们的后盾。

The opportunity to aid our ancestors is a precious gift from our mythic queen herself. We cannot squander this moment. These ancients must be protected. The Kir'Ko leader recognized an ally immediately. The battle begins.
这次能够帮助我们先祖的机遇一定是女皇亲自送给我们的宝贵礼物。我们不能白白浪费这次机会，一定要保护好我们的先祖。那名奇尔寇首领立刻认出了盟友。战斗打响了！
Within the excavated earth, the silver ring lies open. The time rift crackled its response as we stepped through it. We will inflame the power of the Kir'Ko in an era when there was little hope.
银制的圆环在挖开的泥土里打开，当我们穿过时间裂缝时，它发出噼啪的声响作为回应。我们将在一个希望渺茫的时代里，唤起奇尔寇人的力量。

The Kir'Ko rebellion was routed. They may regroup, but the time rift dilated and we had but a moment in which to return to our own time. Before we left, the Paragon Commander rewarded our services by sending one of his Dragonfly aces to join our cause. I can only imagine the horror this one Paragon trooper will experience once realizing all that has happened since the Cataclysm.
奇尔寇叛军被击败了。他们也许会卷土重来，但时间裂缝不断膨胀，我们只能趁此时返回我们自己的时代。在我们离开之前，完人指挥官将手下最优秀的一名帝国蜻蜓交给了我们，并对我们的付出表示感谢。我已经能够想象得到，当这名完人骑兵发现大灾变之后完人经历的种种变故时，将会有多么恐惧。
Dragonfly is the name of Paragon ground attack craft, a tier 2 unit/vehicle.

We entered the rift and approached the Paragon to give aide. They accepted without question, as if their superior gifts gave them the knowledge that the universe itself would fight for them. This era left us all wondering if we should explain the terrible things yet to come, but instead we restrained ourselves and prepared to put down the rebellion.
我们进入了裂缝，去往了完人身边并给予他们帮助。他们毫无异议地接受了我们，仿佛他们超群的天赋告诉他们，就连宇宙也会为他们而战。这个时代不禁让我们所有人都在思考：我们是否应该告诉他们即将发生的可怕之事？但我们克制住了自己，将精力全部投入到了镇压叛乱之上。
The time rift crackles in the air, waiting for our team to jump to the aid of the Paragon and beat back the primitive Kir'Ko rebels.
时间裂缝在空气中噼啪作响，等待我们的队伍跳入并帮助完人击退原始的奇尔寇叛军。
Do not intervene with the anomaly, establish a research base
不介入异常时空，建立研究基地

Thinking better of interfering with the space-time continuum, our scientists established a research project based around the anomaly. We've already learned many new insights about respecting the nature of the universe.
我们的科学家再三考虑之后，决定放弃干预时空，并围绕时空异常建立了一个研究项目。我们已经知晓了许多深刻见解，宇宙的本质应当得到尊重。
Stabilize the rift into a Phase Manipulator module
将裂缝稳定在一个相位操纵器模块中

Instead of exploiting the effect of the anomaly, we can use the power of Voidtech to capture the whole complex phenomena into a Phase Manipulator. With a concerted inversion of the time dimension, we constricted the rift, binding random uncertainty, and built a resource that we can tap for the foreseeable future.
我们并没有选择利用时空异常的效果，而是用虚空科技的力量将整个复杂的现象控制在了一个相位操纵器中。通过对时间维度的协调倒转，我们缩小了裂缝并控制住了随机的不稳定因素，为可预见的未来建立了一个资源库。
Kingping is the name of the club.
We stumble upon a cavern in which an underground club seems to be hidden... but the club is entirely populated by penguins.
我们在无意中发现了一个山洞，里面似乎别有洞天，隐藏着一个地下俱乐部…然而里面竟然全是企鹅。
Our excavation uncovered a pair of functional doors. Even more unsettling, behind those doors was what appeared to be a rowdy frontier bar... populated by man-sized penguins.
我们挖出了两扇还未损坏的门。但更令人不安的是，门后似乎是一个嘈杂的边境酒吧…里面坐着的竟然都是与人类大小无异的企鹅。
A massive penguin behind a poker-table beckoned to us to join the game. He's the betting type of player. As we get comfortable, it pointed to a sign stating: 'All bets in Cosmite or your lives."
一只身型巨大的企鹅在一张扑克桌后面示意我们加入游戏，一看就是那种喜欢赌博的类型。等我们坐定之后，它指了指一个标牌，上面写着：“押注只接受宇宙合金或是你的性命。”
Cosmite is a valuable and rare resource used for advanced technology in lore and in game.
下注宇宙合金开始游戏

The face of the tuxedo-wearing avian was hard to read, but we trained on games of chance! We won. It let out an angry squawk that sounded like, 'Beginner's luck!' It clapped its flippers. More penguins brought out our reward: a large black egg. The avian then winked. The room warped in on itself. Reality galumphed like a stone dropped in deep water. All went dark. Hours passed. We awoke in a featureless cave, save for a large black egg.
我们很难看穿这只穿着礼服的企鹅表情，但我们接受过运气游戏的训练！我们获得了胜利，企鹅发出了一声愤怒的尖叫，听起来好像在说“新手的运气！”它拍了拍身上的鳍，一堆企鹅涌了过来，手中拿着给我们的奖品：一颗巨大的黑蛋。那只企鹅眨了眨眼，整个房间扭曲起来。现实好像石头一样坠入了深水之中，四周一片漆黑。几个小时后，我们醒了过来。洞穴中空无一物，只有那颗巨大的黑蛋。
the Black Egg is the item rewarded for this site.

The large penguin's game was strong. Too strong. Despite our best efforts, the tuxedo-wearing avian won all the Cosmite we had to wager. With a beaky grin, it squawked what sounded like, "Shame you play so bad. I still had fun, so take this." It handed us a fully-charged energy cell, then winked. The world folded inward around us. We all passed out, awakening later in an empty cave with a single glowing energy cell in our midst.
那只巨大的企鹅玩游戏很厉害，十分厉害。尽管我们尽了最大的努力，但它还是赢走了我们所有的宇宙合金。它咧嘴笑着，好像在说：“真是遗憾，但你们真是太差劲了。但我还是玩得很开心，所以收下这个吧。”它递给我们一块充满了能量的电池，然后眨了眨眼睛。突然，身边的世界向我们折叠而来，我们都昏了过去。不知过了多久，我们在一个空荡的洞穴中醒了过来，身边放着那块闪闪发光的能量电池。
Cosmite is a valuable and rare resource used for advanced technology in lore and in game.

The tuxedo-wearing avian played a hard game, but our player won. Admitting defeat, the penguin squawked in disapproval, "Reckless fools! You win today." His flapped his flippers and a parade of penguins emerged carrying a large black egg. Then with a wink, the whole world sucked into its nostrils. We awoke hours later in an empty cavern. We laughed nervously, convinced we'd shared a collective hallucination, until we noticed there was a large black egg on the ground between us.
穿着礼服的企鹅进行了一场艰苦的比赛，但最后我们还是赢了。它承认了自己的失败，不高兴地大叫着：“鲁莽的蠢货！今天算你们赢了。”它拍打着身上的鳍，一群企鹅带着一颗巨大的黑蛋冒了出来。它眨了眨眼，整个世界都被吸进了它的鼻孔。几个小时后，我们在一个空旷的洞穴里醒了过来。我们心神未定地笑了笑，确信我们都产生了相同的幻觉，直到我们看见地上放着一颗巨大的黑蛋。
the Black Egg is the item rewarded for this site.

We played our best game, but the tuxedo-wearing avian played better. Nervously, we waited for the penguin to demand our lives. Through a beaky smile, it squawked what sounded like, "Confident, no more! Join us!" It pointed a flipper to one of our surveyors, who cried aloud. Limbs became flippers as the surveyor morphed into a dumbfounded penguin. With a blink, the bar folded into darkness. We awoke hours later in a barren cavern. We are missing one surveyor... and our soul.

尽管我们尽了最大努力，但那只身穿礼服的企鹅更胜我们一筹。我们紧张地等待着那只企鹅前来取走我们的性命。谁知它的尖嘴竟然笑了起来，好像在说：“你们很有自信！但再也没有机会了！加入我们吧！”它用鳍指了指我们的一位调查员，只听见他大声地尖叫起来，然后变成了一只呆头呆脑的企鹅，四肢也变成了鳍状。眨眼之间，酒吧陷入了一片黑暗。几个小时后，我们在一个空旷的洞穴里醒了过来。我们中的一位调查员失去了踪影…我们的灵魂好像也跟着失去了。
"I have already won" - Phase Distort the game
“我已经赢了”- 利用相位扭曲进行游戏
Phase Distorting is Void-Tech speak for altering reality.

Using Voidtech, we couldn't lose. A miniaturized phase distortion device collapsed all probable hands into one containing all aces. The tuxedo-wearing avian rose. It squawked disgustedly what sounded like, "Bah! Phasewalkers! Take this prize!" Other penguins trotted out a large black egg. They all bowed. The floor folded into the ceiling. Darkness devoured us. We passed out, awaking in an empty cavern. We laughed at the impossible hallucination, until we saw that large black egg on the ground.

只要有了虚空科技，我们不可能会输。一个小型相位扭曲装置将所有的可能性全部排除，只剩下了一副全是“A”的手牌。穿着礼服的企鹅站了起来，鄙夷地叫着，好像在说：“呸！相位行者！赶紧拿走奖品！”其他企鹅快步跑了出来，拿着一颗巨大的黑蛋，并且向我们鞠躬行礼。突然，地板与天花板折叠在了一起，黑暗将我们吞噬。我们昏了过去，之后在一个空旷的洞穴中醒了过来。回想起之前那些不可思议的幻觉，我们都笑了起来，直到我们看见地上摆着一颗巨大的黑蛋。
Phasewalkers is a term to refer to users of Void-tech
A testing facility where Terratech researchers experimented with the effects of the Psi-fish feeding process using convicts.
一处泰拉科技研究员用囚犯来测试灵能水母摄食过程效果的试验设施。
Psi-fish is the name of an in universe alien species.

We uncovered an underground facility. Inside, we found it running on auxiliary power. Though the exterior facade was made to look abandoned, following some powerlines, we discovered a large laboratory filled with aqueous tanks. We found bodies suspended in each tank. Then something moved.
我们发现了一个地下设施。进入设施之后，我们发现这里依靠辅助动力运行。虽然地下设施的外表看起来早已荒废已久，但沿着一些输电线向里走，我们发现了一个放着许多水箱的大型实验室，每个水箱里都漂浮着许多尸体。突然，有什么东西动了一下。

A Psi-Fish Medusa stood suspended in a large tank in the center of the room. Bobbing in smaller vats around it were human bodies. One of them seemed barely alive. Laboratory lights flickered as we stared, trying to contain our disgust. The Medusa greeted us with a joyous tone, "Friend, we feel radiant in your presence. Help us. Free us."
一只灵能水母美杜莎漂浮在房间中央的一个大水箱里，周围的小水箱里漂浮着人类的尸体，其中一个人似乎还有一息尚存。这时，实验室的灯光开始闪烁起来，试图抑制住我们的厌恶。美杜莎用喜悦的声音欢迎了我们：“朋友，我们因你的到来而容光焕发。帮助我们。解救我们。”
Psi-fish is the name of an in universe alien species. Medusa is a Psi-fish unit.
Attempt to flush the Psifish and save the human
冲走灵能水母，拯救那个人类
Psi-fish is the name of an in universe alien species.

With the Psi-Fish dead, a woman stirred. We extracted her from a 'feeding tank'. She came here with a group of rebels. The scientists studying the Medusa had negotiated a deal to pacify the rebellious. Five prisoners came into these chambers. All ended up feeding the Psi-Fish. No actual minds were altered. She's convinced the Medusa simply wanted to feed, and had no intention of rehabilitating the prisoners. She offered her allegiance for freeing her.
灵能水母死后，一个女人突然动了一下。我们把她从一个“喂养箱”里捞了出来。原来，她是和一群叛军来到了这里。研究美杜莎的科学家签订了一项安抚叛乱者的协议，五名囚犯被押入了这里，最后统统被用来喂养这只灵能水母了，并没有改变他们想要叛乱的思想。这个女人坚信，美杜莎只是想要填饱肚子而已，并不打算改变这些囚犯的意图。为了报答我们的解救之恩，她选择为我们效命。
Psi-fish is the name of an in universe alien species. Medusa is a Psi-fish unit.

The Psi-Fish cannot be trusted. We attempted to flush the large tank, but the Medusa lurched to life, breaking the container walls with a burst of psionic energy. The Medusa loomed over us, the oppressive tones in its mental voice darkening our minds: "We are disappointed, friend."
灵能水母不值得信任。我们试着将大水箱里的水全部排了出去，但美杜莎突然活了过来，用一股灵能炸开了水箱。它赫然耸立在我们面前，令人压抑的心灵声音使我们的脸色沉了下来，它说：“我们很失望，朋友。”
Psi-fish is the name of an in universe alien species. Medusa is a Psi-fish unit.
A Psi-Fish Medusa lingers inside an underground research facility, guarding human specimens that appear to be injured. We must fight.
一只灵能水母美杜莎徘徊在一个地下研究设施内，守着许多看上去受了伤的人类标本。我们必须战斗。
Psi-fish is the name of an in universe alien species. Medusa is a Psi-fish unit.
Do not interfere, restore the facility
Restoring the research facility to working conditions…
正在将研究设施恢复到工作状态…

We left the Psi-Fish to go about its business, while restoring the facility to working condition. Scouring the databanks showed us that the Medusa has eerily absorbed human traits as it fed upon the human subjects. It has evolved strong emotive characteristics. This odd case will surly give us more insights as we continue this fascinating case-study.
我们让灵能水母继续它的工作，同时把整个设施恢复到了工作状态。通过对数据库的搜索，我们发现美杜莎在进食人类的过程中，竟然还会吸收人类的特征，这真是太奇怪了。它已经进化成了一种具有强烈情绪的物种。只要我们继续研究这个有趣的案例，肯定能够掌握更多发现。
Psi-fish is the name of an in universe alien species. Medusa is a Psi-fish unit.
Ask the Psifish to commune with the strange Medusa
让灵能水母与这个奇怪的美杜莎交流
Psi-fish is the name of an in universe alien species. Medusa is a Psi-fish unit.
The Psifish are communing with the Medusa…
灵能水母正在与美杜莎交流…
Psi-fish is the name of an in universe alien species. Medusa is a Psi-fish unit.

The Psi-Fish communed with the strange Medusa. Only one human prisoner could be salvaged. The Psi-Fish forced the Medusa to 'feed elsewhere'. The female prisoner explained that she was a captive, brought in for the crime of civil disobedience because she protested when the local mob killed her husband. She, along with other subjects, were fed to the Medusa so that the scientists could study the Psi-Fish feeding process. She offered to join us in gratitude for her freedom.
灵能水母与这只奇怪的美杜莎进行了交流。看来，我们只能救下一名还活着的人类囚犯。灵能水母要求美杜莎“到别处觅食”。那名女囚犯解释说，她的丈夫被当地暴徒杀害，她前去抗议，结果被人以非暴力反抗罪名逮捕了起来。之后，她和其他研究对象一起被送到了这里作为美杜莎的食物，供科学家们研究灵能水母的摄食过程。为了报答我们的解救之恩，她主动提出要为我们效命。
Psi-fish is the name of an in universe alien species. Medusa is a Psi-fish unit.

The Medusa was so friendly, we decided to give it its freedom exactly as it demanded. It finished feeding and then offered us a gift of immeasurable knowledge. The creature wrapped its tentacles around our foreheads and a rush of sensations filled our heads. While we were scrambling to record all the insights that entered our consciousness, the Medusa fled from our control.
这只美杜莎看起来没有恶意，我们决定按照它的要求将它解救出来。它进食完毕后，向我们赠送了一个礼物：不可估量的知识。它将触角缠绕在我们的额头上，一股强烈的感觉涌入我们的脑海。当我们手忙脚乱地想要记下脑海中显现的事物时，那只美杜莎逃走了。

The site appears to be a military laboratory dedicated to psionic research. Focusing crystals, psionic amplifiers and consciousness circuits have been found. Perhaps this site was involved in the creation of what would become PsiTec?
这个地方似乎是一个军事实验室，专门从事灵能研究。我们在这里发现了聚焦水晶、灵能增幅器和意识电路等东西，也许这个地方曾经参与创造了灵能科技？
PsiTec is the in universe name for Technology that interacts with Psionics, mostly used by the Syndicate.

We've uncovered a military library used for psionic research. We've discovered focusing crystals, psionic amplifiers and consciousness stimulators. We are all curious if this place was instrumental in pioneering PsiTec. There are mummified corpses scattered all about the locality. There is a rich library of biological samples and research data here.
我们发现了一个曾经用来研究灵能的军事图书馆，里面摆放着聚焦水晶、灵能增幅器和意识电路等设备。我们无不好奇，这个地方是否曾经帮助创造了灵能科技。除了遍地的干尸以外，这里还存放着丰富的生物样品和研究数据。
PsiTec is the in universe name for Technology that interacts with Psionics, mostly used by the Syndicate.

In the center chamber, a spherical device is covered with pulsating purple glyphs. The corpses surround the sphere, and each holds a weapon. Were they frightened of the power from this device? Our scientists believe it is some sort of communications system, or possibly a portal creator. We all want to activate it.
我们在中心房间里发现了一个闪烁着紫色符号的球形设备，许多尸体散落在球体的周围，而且所有人手上都拿着武器。他们是害怕这个设备的力量吗？我们的科学家认为这是某种通讯系统，或者也可能是一个传送门创造器。无论如何，我们都想将它激活。

The portal crackled shut as the Psi-Fish were destroyed. The researchers must have been attempting to communicate with the Psi-Fish using PsiTec. But they hardly responded to our entreaties. Regardless, their findings will prove useful. We looted the facility, recovering various rare PsiTec and intelligence.
灵能水母被消灭后，传送门啪的一声关上了。那些研究人员肯定是想用灵能科技尝试与灵能水母交流，但这些水母对我们的请求几乎没有任何回应。无论如何，他们的发现将会派上用场。我们把这里洗劫一空，回收了各种珍贵的灵能科技和情报。
PsiTec is the in universe name for Technology that interacts with Psionics, mostly used by the Syndicate. Psi-fish is the name of an in universe alien species.

After careful preparation, we discover a big red button, which had to be pushed. The automated defenses lurched to life as a soft light flooded the room. The room was filled with strange translucent beings floating all around. Psi-Fish. Turrets instantly opened fire on the intruders.
经过紧锣密鼓的准备之后，我们发现了一个大大的红色按钮。按下按钮后，一束柔和的光线涌入房间，自动防御系统被激活了，房间里四处漂浮着奇怪的半透明生物。是灵能水母。炮塔几乎是在瞬间向这些入侵者开起了火来。
Psi-fish is the name of an in universe alien species.
A portal yawns open, summoning Psi-Fish through the portal. Automatic defensive turrets train on the creatures, and a battle ensues.
一道传送门逐渐打开，灵能水母不断地从中涌了出来。自动防御炮塔对准了这些生物，战斗一触即发。
Psi-fish is the name of an in universe alien species.
Disassemble the Device and restore the laboratory
拆卸设备并恢复实验室

We managed to restore the laboratory to working order. The central device was successfully decommissioned. We gathered a plethora of useful research and valuable lab equipment in the course of our efforts.
我们设法使实验室恢复了运转，并且成功拆除了中央设备。我们在这个过程中收集了大量有用的研究资料和宝贵的实验设备。
Destroy the device, and loot the ruins

Success! Our forces make quick work of the device. We've dismantled the whole lab and extracted various artifacts. Brighter minds than ours can figure out just how useful the items in this place will be, but we have acquired many valuable treasures.
成功了！我们的部队很快摧毁了设备并拆除了整个实验室，带走了各种宝贵的物件。也许比我们聪明的人能够明白这些东西和这个地方的价值，但我们只想拿走这些珍贵的财宝。

The disabling charges detonated prematurely. The resulting psionic feedback amplified the explosion, causing horrific damage to everything. As the smoke cleared, we salvaged the scraps of what might have been a significant breakthrough, had we not prematurely blown it all up.
炸弹因短路而提前发生了爆炸，灵能反冲加剧了爆炸的影响，将一切都毁掉了。烟雾散去后，我们回收了一些废品，如果不是这场预料之外的爆炸，这些东西可能本应该是珍贵的财宝。
Those are Psifish glyphs, contact them
那些是灵能水母的符号，联系它们
Psi-fish is the name of an in universe alien species.
Psi-fish is the name of an in universe alien species.

The Psi-Fish emissaries aided us with the device. It is a cross-dimensional portal. The researchers managed to communicate with the Psi-Fish, assisting us to complete the PsiTec. We activated the portal. More Psi-Fish appeared. The Psi-Fish wrapped their tentacles around each other, then around our minds, filling us with knowledge. This changed everything. The device continued to pulsate as they disappeared through the portal.
灵能水母的密使为我们提供了帮助。原来这是一个能够跨越维度的传送门。研究人员成功与灵能水母进行了交流，它们帮助我们完成了这项灵能科技。接着，我们激活了传送门，更多的灵能水母从门内涌了出来。它们的触须相互缠绕，随即触入了我们的思想，给我们带来了无比的知识。这改变了一切。不久之后，它们从传送门中消失了，只剩下那台设备仍在嗡嗡运转。
Psi-fish is the name of an in universe alien species.
Tyrannodon, an alien T-rex dinosaur like creature used by the Amazon.
The well preserved remains of a Tyrannodon. Through investigation we can find out why the beast is missing so much of its armor…
一具保存完好的暴龙遗骸。通过调查，我们能够发现这只野兽身上的护甲为何几乎全都消失了踪影…
Tyrannodon, an alien T-rex dinosaur like creature used by the Amazon.

We located what remains of a Tyrannodon, complete with an obedience collar. The creature's cause of death is currently unclear, but it clearly was an extraordinary physical specimen. We think this may be one of the original experiments. The body's location indicates it must have somehow escaped its research containment.
我们找到了一只暴龙的残骸，脖子上还带着一个顺从颈圈。目前尚不清楚这个生物的死因，但很明显它是一个非同寻常的实验标本。我们认为它可能是最初的实验品之一。通过尸体所处的位置可以看出，它可能用某种方法逃出了研究室。
Tyrannodon, an alien T-rex dinosaur like creature used by the Amazon.

The Tyrannodon's corpse, even robbed of the spark of life, is an imposing sight. Its belly looks unusually swollen, and some of the team wishes to dissect the contents of its innards to see if any clues as to what made this creature so strong and well preserved. There are more secrets to be found if we dig into the gruesome details.
尽管暴龙已经失去了生命，但光是一具尸体也依旧是一个壮观的景象。它的腹部看起来异常肿胀，我们的队员希望解剖它的内脏，看看能否弄清楚是什么让这种生物如此强壮，并且还能在死后保存得如此完好。如果我们深入研究这些可怕的细节，肯定会发现更多的秘密。
Tyrannodon, an alien T-rex dinosaur like creature used by the Amazon.
Cut it open and recover what it consumed
切开暴龙的尸体，取出它吃掉的东西

We opened the creature's gullet and pulled out an assortment of limbs, including the intact body of a Biomancer. Her data-recorder is functional, with details of the Tyrannodon specimen. It was part of some exhibit meant to entertain the Amazons, but predictably, life found a way to escape, went on a rampage and ate its audience. A wealth of the creature's secrets are ours, perhaps enough that one day we can resynthesize the thing.
我们切开了暴龙的食道，取出了各种各样的残肢，其中包括一具完整的生化师尸体。她的数据记录仪仍然能够正常运行，里面详细地记录着这只暴龙的信息。这只暴龙原本是为了取悦亚马逊人而进行展览的一部分，但正如眼前所见，它逃了出去，横冲直撞并且吃掉了它的观众。我们从这只暴龙身上知道了许多秘密，也许有一天能够重新合成出这种生物。

Tyrannodon, an alien T-rex dinosaur like creature used by the Amazon. Amazon are a player race that specializes in bio-manipulation, originated from Terra-tech. Biomancers - Amazon bio manipulation experts, named after the tier 2 support unit.

Disgusting... There was nothing at all interesting in the creature's belly, at least nothing that didn't smell foul and made us all retch when we sliced it open, so we buried it all and abandoned that idea as something out of bad science fiction.
太恶心了…这家伙的肚子里没有任何值得研究的东西，所有东西都散发着一股恶臭，我们切开它时都快吐了。我们将它埋了起来，放弃了那些像恐怖科幻小说里那样继续解剖下去的想法。
Let our biologists conduct a full autopsy
让我们的生物学家进行一次全面的尸检
Biologists are conducting a full autopsy…
生物学家正在进行全面尸检…

Biologists found the body of a Biomancer inside the creature's gut. The deceased Amazon's bio-recorders had done a remarkably thorough job, recording even as the creature digested its own trainer. The beast was to be part of a demonstration of Amazon ingenuity. Our biologists think the trainer fed her specimen extra muscle stimulants to demonstrate the superiority of her breeding, which it did by eating her and escaping. Without further sustenance from its creators, its body quickly weakened and died. The bio-recorder is full of valuable secrets.

生物学家在暴龙的肠道内发现了一名生化师的尸体，这位死去的亚马逊人携带的生物记录仪居然还未损坏，甚至在暴龙吃掉自己的这名训练员时都还在运转。这只野兽曾经是一支亚马逊游行队的一员。我们的生物学家认为，这位训练员给这只暴龙喂食了过多的肌肉兴奋剂，想要证明她所饲养的暴龙身体是如何的强壮，但正是因为这样暴龙才会吃掉她而逃了出去。在失去了创造者给予它的营养之后，这只暴龙很快便死去了。这个生物记录仪里面有着许多珍贵的秘密。
Amazon are a player race that specializes in bio-manipulation, originated from Terra-tech.
Our Biomancers should clear this up swiftly
我们的生化师应该很快就能解决这些问题
Biomancers - Amazon bio manipulation experts, named after the tier 2 support unit.
Biomancers are recovering data on the carcass...
生化师正在恢复尸体中的数据…
Biomancers - Amazon bio manipulation experts, named after the tier 2 support unit.

Our biomancers tended to the specimen. We found a data recorder in its belly, no doubt belonging to its foolish trainer. The older data does have some interesting anomalies we've never considered. Its muscles appear stronger than had previously been thought possible. We believe we can leverage this discovery to enhance our own research into the creatures. This will honor our fallen Tyrannodon. No doubt she was a clever girl.
我们的生化师解剖了这只暴龙，在它的肚子里，我们发现了一个数据记录仪。毫无疑问，这肯定是那名愚蠢训练员的东西。以前的数据有一些我们从未发现过的异常现象，这十分有趣，比如这只暴龙的肌肉比我们想象中要强壮很多。我们可以利用这一发现来加强我们自己对这些生物的研究，这也将是我们纪念这位死去生化师的方式。她是个聪明的女人。
Biomancers - Amazon bio manipulation experts, named after the tier 2 support unit.
This creature could be a perfect vessel for the Xenoplague...
这个生物可能是异星疫病的完美容器…
Xenoplague, a secret technology that infects and mutates it's victims into new creatures.
Injecting the cadaver with the Alpha strain…
向暴龙的尸体注射初始毒株…
Alpha Strain is an alternative name for the Xenoplague infection itself.

We injected the cadaver with the Alpha Strain. The old creature's unique physiology is strong enough to form a new living creature. The Xenoplague unlocked suppressed genetic abilities. Delightfully, the modified creature sprouted jagged venomous spikes. It was good before, but better with the life-improving Alpha Strain animating it. A towering Tyrannodon with toxic quills stands perfectly obedient and ready to serve us.
我们在暴龙的尸体内注入了初始毒株，这种古老生物独特的生理机能足以形成一种新的生物。异星疫病很快便解锁了被抑制住的基因能力。让我们欣慰的是，这种经过改造的生物长出了锯齿状的毒刺。这只暴龙在此之前就已经成长得十分健全了，但在能够改造生命的初始毒株推动下，它变得更加完美了。一只长着毒刺的高大暴龙重生了，它完全服从命令，随时准备为我们效力。

Xenoplague, a secret technology that infects and mutates it's victims into new creatures. Alpha Strain is an alternative name for the Xenoplague infection itself. Tyrannodon, an alien T-rex dinosaur like creature used by the Amazon.
A Sleeper Vessel is a space colony ship upon which Vanguard expeditions would enter cryo sleep in order to reach new worlds and set up new links to the Nexus network for Star Union Colonization.
一艘坠毁的先锋沉睡者飞船。

A Sleeper Vessel is a space colony ship upon which Vanguard expeditions would enter cryo sleep in order to reach new worlds and set up new links to the Nexus network for Star Union Colonization. Vanguard are a player race of the Militarized expeditionary arm of the Star Union that recently awoke from Cryo Sleep.

We've unearthed the remains of a Vanguard Sleeper Vessel. The wreck's power core is running at bare minimum, but strangely still intact. The ship itself appears to have collided here, and over time the crater filled. We've detected what can only be explained as a number of experimental weapons onboard.
我们发现了一艘先锋沉睡者飞船的残骸。沉船的动力核心正在以最低限度运转，但奇怪的是它仍然完好无损。飞船本身似乎是在这里坠毁的，但随着时间的推移，坠毁造成的坑洞已经被铺平了。我们在飞船上发现了一些类似实验武器的东西。

A Sleeper Vessel is a space colony ship upon which Vanguard expeditions would enter cryo sleep in order to reach new worlds and set up new links to the Nexus network for Star Union Colonization. Vanguard are a player race of the Militarized expeditionary arm of the Star Union that recently awoke from Cryo Sleep.

We discovered a derelict ship in a crater of debris. It took severe impact damage, yet remarkably remained intact. The ship's insides were gruesome. We discovered rows of spoiled cryosleep pods--so many casualties. The whole ship was a lost cause, until we discovered a single fully-powered undamaged pod. It is labeled Franky 'Sparklefingers' Nissen, the ship's Captain. Alarmingly, the power system was jury-rigged to extend the pod's function. Unfortunately, it's now failing. We must act quickly to save the Captain.
我们在一个废墟坑中发现了一艘废弃的飞船。这艘飞船遭受了巨大的撞击，但它却奇迹般地完好无损。飞船的内部阴森可怕，一排排冷冻休眠舱均已被破坏，人员伤亡十分惨重。整个飞船一片死寂。但是，我们却唯独发现了一艘供能完好的休眠舱，上面的标签写着：弗兰克“火花指”尼森，船长。令人担忧的是，这个休眠舱配备的临时供能系统已经失效了。我们必须赶快行动，救出这名船长。
Cpt. Franky 'Sparkfingers' Nissen is the name of the hero that can be rescued from this site.
Attempt to awaken the survivor with the generator's remaining power.
尝试用发电机的剩余能量唤醒这位幸存者。
Pushing the exausted generator to it's limit in an attempt to awaken the survivor…
正在将快要枯竭的发电机推到极限，试图唤醒幸存者…

We watched with the rigidity of a frozen corpse as we initiated the thawing procedure. The power cells flashed and fluctuated, threatening to fail altogether, while the body returned to warm flesh. Slowly coming to his senses, Franky awoke groggily. Then the power cut out. The Captain was devastated that only he survived. We tried to explain how the world works now, and he committed to join our cause if we helped him bury his lost crew and friends.
启动解冻程序之后，我们目不转睛地观察着这具冻得僵硬的休眠者。当他的身体逐渐恢复体温时，能量电池闪烁不定，很快就将彻底毁坏。弗兰克逐渐恢复了知觉，有气无力地苏醒了过来。也是在这时，电量耗尽了。船长对只有他一人幸存下来这个事实悲痛欲绝。我们试图向他解释现在是一个怎样的世界，而他也表示如果我们能帮助他埋葬死去的船员和朋友，他愿意加入我们。
Franky is the name of the hero that can be rescued from this site. Captain refers to Franky's rank in this case.

Sadly, the power fluctuations turned Sparkfingers into a half-cooked, half-frozen lesson of what not to do when thawing a frozen person. Our disappointment was palpable. We have no other choice but to take the few remaining resources before sealing this sad ship turned gravesite.
不幸的是，能量的波动把这位船长变成了一具半熟半冻的尸体。这也给我们上了一课，知道了解冻过程中的禁忌。我们的情绪万分低落，只能选择拿走剩下的资源，然后把这艘不幸的飞船封锁起来变成一座坟墓。
This expedition was lost when it crashed here, loot the vessel
探险队在这里坠毁并失去了联系，洗劫这艘飞船
A Sleeper Vessel is a space colony ship upon which Vanguard expeditions would enter cryo sleep in order to reach new worlds and set up new links to the Nexus network for Star Union Colonization.
Everything dies. We had no guarantees the last sleeper would help us, and the cryopod's power cells were salvageable. We siphoned the generator's remaining power and stripped the ship for valuables.
所有人都死了，但有一个人还活着。我们不能保证他醒来后是否会帮助我们，而且冷冻舱的电池还可以回收。我们抽走了发电机剩余的电力，拿走了飞船上的珍贵物品。
Attempt to supplement the power to safely awaken the survivor
尝试补充能量并安全地唤醒幸存者
Supplementing the generator with our own energy supply to safely reawaken the survivor…
正在将我们自己的能量给发电机充能，从而安全地唤醒幸存者…

We supplemented the power sources on the cryochamber's interface and initiated the thawing procedure. Slowly, the frozen engineer returned to life. His first concern was his crew. He cried at their loss. He listened carefully as we explained how the world has changed since he boarded the sleeper vessel. He agreed to join us if we paid homage to his fallen friends. We salvaged what we could and waited while Franky said his peace.
我们将电源连接至冷冻舱的接口，并启动了解冻程序。慢慢地，这位冻僵的工程师苏醒了过来。弗兰克首先想到的就是其他船员的安全，在得知了他们的死讯之后，他忍不住哭泣起来。我们向弗兰克解释了自从他登上这艘飞船以来世界发生了怎样的变化，他在一旁仔细地听着。之后，他表示如果我们能够帮他埋葬死去的朋友，他愿意加入我们。我们尽力回收了一些还能用得上东西，等待弗兰克平静下来。

Franky is the name of the hero that can be rescued from this site. A Sleeper Vessel is a space colony ship upon which Vanguard expeditions would enter cryo sleep in order to reach new worlds and set up new links to the Nexus network for Star Union Colonization.
Awaken the survivor using a Vanguard contingency plan
使用先锋应急计划唤醒这名幸存者
Vanguard are a player race of the Militarized expeditionary arm of the Star Union that recently awoke from Cryo Sleep.
Reawakening the survivor using emergency stations according to Vanguard Contingency plans…
正在根据先锋应急计划，使用紧急措施唤醒这名幸存者…
Vanguard are a player race of the Militarized expeditionary arm of the Star Union that recently awoke from Cryo Sleep.

This Vanguard vessel is very similar to one of our own. It took little more than a quick consult of the ship's manual to locate a contingency circuit. Plugging into the backup, we powered the last functioning cryochamber while it thawed its passenger. Franky awoke, confused and sad that his crew didn't survive the crash. The Captain shares our values, and as we unfold the details of history since his sleep, he considered himself lucky that we stumbled upon him.
这艘先锋飞船和我们自己的飞船非常相似，因此只需快速查阅一下飞船手册就能找到应急电路。我们插入备用电源，为最后一个还在正常工作的冷冻舱供上了电力，并解冻了里面的休眠者。弗兰克醒了过来，非常困惑，也非常悲伤，他的船员都没能在这次坠毁中幸存下来。这位船长和我们有着共同的价值观，我们向他讲述了他沉睡后世界上发生的事，他也为自己被我们偶然发现而感到幸运。

Vanguard are a player race of the Militarized expeditionary arm of the Star Union that recently awoke from Cryo Sleep. Franky is the name of the hero that can be rescued from this site. Captain refers to Franky's rank in this case.

A Heritor artifact that was guarded by 4 siphoners in long ages past. They were ordered to stand guard until the end of time and so they have, even as the structure collapsed around them. They devised a way to survive, by entering the artifact.
这个继承者神器在很久以前由四名生命汲取者保护，他们受命履行自己的使命，直到时间的尽头，甚至在这个地方坍塌时仍然坚守在原地。他们进入了这个神器，并设法存活了下来。

We've uncovered a small temple bereft of the usual accoutrements we've come to associate with the Heritors. There are no decorative crystals, no signs of the typical Es'Teq vestments. A subtle turquoise glowed from a container fixed at the center of the chamber. It's an altar and is really the only obvious indicator that this barren place was once a place of gathering for Heritors.
我们发现了一座小型神庙，这里与我们通常所见的继承者神庙不太一样，似乎缺少了某些饰物。这里没有任何装饰水晶，也没有埃斯特克传统的祭衣。大厅正中央放着一个容器，散发着微弱的青绿色光芒。这是一座祭坛，也是这片荒芜之地上唯一能够表明这里曾是继承者集会之所的证明。

On closer inspection, the altar appears to contain an artifact similar to an Ark of Essence. The Essence of several beings swirl within it, sustaining it. Awakening this artifact may prove dangerous, but we are also curious about the enigmatic personalities that put their life force into this artifact with the hopes of being reawakened someday.
我们走近观察，发现祭坛内似乎放置着一件类似于精华方舟的神器。数个生命的精华在其中相互盘绕，维持着它的运转。虽然唤醒这件神器可能会带来危险，但我们非常好奇究竟是哪些人将自己的生命之力放在了这件神器之中，等待某一天被人唤醒。

Phantasmal forces materialized to guard the artifact as we set about to activate it. They brandished their weapons and look eager to fight. All attempts to reason failed. After so long, to be awakened and violently active is a thrill they look unwilling to relinquish.
当我们准备激活方舟时，数个幽灵般的身影忽然现身前来保护这件神器。他们挥舞着武器，似乎非常渴望战斗。我们用尽了所有办法想要与他们沟通，但都失败了。毕竟经过了如此漫长的沉睡后被人唤醒，这种猛烈的兴奋感使他们欲罢不能。

Four phantasmal forces materialized to guard the artifact as we set about to activate it. They brandished their weapons and look eager to fight. All attempts to reason failed. After so long, to be awakened and violently active is a thrill they look unwilling to relinquish.
当我们准备激活方舟时，四个幽灵般的身影忽然现身，前来保护这件神器。他们挥舞着武器，似乎非常渴望战斗。我们用尽了所有办法想要与他们沟通，但都失败了。毕竟经过了如此漫长的沉睡后被人唤醒，这种猛烈的兴奋感使他们欲罢不能。

With the Es'Teq guardians dispatched, our researchers quickly deduce that this Ark could be used to store the Essence of battle-victims. Should our best fighters fall, this artifact could be used to restore them to life on the battlefield.
解决掉这些埃斯特克守卫之后，我们的研究员很快便推断出这个方舟可以用来储存在战斗中牺牲之人的精华。如果我们精锐的战士不幸战死，我们可以利用它让他们重返战场。
Claim the Ark as a weapon
Claiming the Ark as a weapon…
正在将方舟作为武器带走…

One does not form a close bond with the electrons in a battery, nor should we awaken what now serves as Essence to power a valuable weapon. We took the artifact and have outfitted it to meet our needs. It serves no purpose to ascribe religious implications to this long dead culture.
没人愿意给自己惹麻烦，我们也不该唤醒现在所谓的精华来为某件珍贵的武器充能。我们只是拿走神器，用它来武装自己，满足我们的需求。我们绝对无意对这个湮灭已久的文化施加任何宗教影响。

Only we understand the deep and meaningful sacrifice of those who gave themselves to the Ark. We will listen to their whispering memories as we merge their essence and teach us all. We are all better for having known those who lived in a time of desperation and loss.
他们将自己的生命献给了方舟，这其中的深意只有我们能够理解。我们会将他们的精华融合，倾听他们记忆的私语，并从中学习一切。了解这些曾生活在绝望而失落年代中的人，能够使我们变得更加美好。

A crazed assembly mechanic that made their own custom Succubots in their many attempts to recreate their youth crush. The bots require affection, the hero can marry the bot or reject them at their peril.
一个疯狂的半机械人技工制造了一批女妓机器人，想要通过各种途径释放青春的荷尔蒙。这些女妓机器人需要得到感情，英雄可以与她们喜结良缘，也可以拒绝她们，不过需要自行承担后果。
We've discovered a workshop for domestic bots hidden among a ruin we were excavating. The fresh marks on the tools indicate something or someone is still using the place.
我们在发掘一片废墟时发现了一个隐藏其中的秘密车间，车间工具上留下的新鲜痕迹表明某人或某物仍在使用这个地方。

One of the bots awoke, eerily beautiful as it stirred to life. She self-identifies as a female called Valer-E. Parts of her plating are missing, yet nothing mars her grace and attractiveness. She recognized our hero immediately and stated it was programmed to mate for life with our hero leading this survey expedition. She proposed marriage.
其中一个机器人醒了过来，透露出一股怪诞的美感。她把自己称为薇莱尔-E，虽然缺失了部分护甲，但她的优雅和魅力并没有因此打折扣。她立刻认出了我们的英雄，并声称她的程序设计就是要与我们率领此次调查探险队的英雄结为夫妻。她提出了结婚。
