She did not take rejection well. She began screaming and flailing her arms about wildly. At first, we thought its reaction a preprogrammed tantrum, but she was actually activating a massive attack construct. She shrieks, "If I can't have you, no one will!"
她不能接受这个结果，并开始大喊大叫起来，张牙舞爪地挥动着手臂。起初，我们以为这只是预先设计好的发脾气程序，然而实际上，她却激活了大肆破坏模式。她尖叫道：“我得不到的东西，其他人也别想得到！”
A she-bot scorned stamps toward us, wrecking everything it can grasp.
一个女机器人满眼鄙夷地迈着沉重的步伐朝我们走来，毁掉了途径的一切。

As Valer-E is blown to bits, we muse upon a creator unaware of the concept of consent. What ancient time could have possibly existed when the word 'no' was not a possibility in romantic entanglements? It baffled all our minds. We hauled out what little loot we could find.
当薇莱尔-E 被炸成碎片时，我们不禁思考，她的制造者是不是并不懂得“赞同”的概念。如果感情纠葛中不存在“拒绝”，那我们又会错过多少历史故事呢？这使我们所有人都感到困惑。最后，我们回收了很少的一些战利品。
接受薇莱尔-E 的求婚请求…

Excitedly, the bots around her animated into a marriage party and conducted the ceremony with robotic efficiency. She then immediately went about submissively servicing our hero's every need, disregarding all the normal social morays of modesty and propriety. She is strangely jealous when anyone else does something for our hero. I fear what she will do when she discovers that our hero already has a spouse, but that's their problem now.
薇莱尔-E 周围的机器人忽然兴奋起来，以机器人特有的超高效率迅速举办了一场婚宴派对，并为她举行了结婚仪式。随后她立马变得顺从起来，事无巨细地侍奉着我们的英雄，成为了一位贤良淑德的妻子。令人不可思议的是，只要有任何人为英雄做了任何事，她都会为此而吃醋。我担心如果她发现我们的英雄其实早已有了配偶时会有怎样的反应，不过，那是他们的自己的家务事了。
Offer to reassemble one of the prototypes to be her partner
向她提议重新组装一个原型机器人作为她的伴侣
Offering to reassemble a partner for Valer-E…
正在提议为薇莱尔-E 重新组装一个伴侣…

Our reverse engineers retrofitted a number of prototypes with a spare Assembly mind unit. It sparked to life with all the personality of our hero. The cyborg and Valer-E share an appropriate intimate moment by touching interface pads palm to palm. She then bowed to recognize our superiority and offered herself to us on the condition her robotic husband (as she called it) joined her. The android remains unaware she had no choice, as robotic compulsion is untraceable.
我们的逆转工程师改造了一个闲置的半机械人单位的原型，并给他赋予了我们英雄的所有性格，使这个半机械人变得鲜活起来。他和薇莱尔-E 通过掌对掌接触接口板共享了一段亲密的时光。接着，她向我们鞠了一躬，表示认同我们的统治，并提出只要她的机器人丈夫（她这样称呼）能够与她在一起，她将愿意加入我们。这个机器人并不知道她其实没有别的选择，因为机器人的强制行为难以追踪。
An excavated Heritor tomb that seems to be source of the emergency signals we have been receiving.
我们持续接收到许多紧急信号，信号来源似乎是一座发掘出来的继承者坟墓。

We’ve excavated a tomb, and we are now certain of the origin of the emergency signal. After barging through the secured vault, we are welcomed by the glowing pods of Essence feeding into the slumbering people who reside here. Further in, we find evidence that the distress signal was activated recently, potentially roused by the activity of the RPR models outside.[br/]We stand inside a Heritor Sanctum, one of the many tombs hidden in this forgotten world.
我们挖到了一座坟墓，现在可以确信，这里就是紧急信号的来源。当我们打开了严密保护的墓室后，数个发着光亮的精华舱映入眼帘，许多沉睡之人躺在其中。随着我们的深入，我们发现求救信号是最近才发出的，可能是由于外部的 RPR 模型活动所引起。[br/]我们在这个继承者圣殿中驻足查看，这里仅仅是这个被遗忘的世界中隐藏的万千坟墓中的一座。

As we dive deeper, we find ourselves at the core of the structure. From here we have command over myriad functions that govern the facility, the most important ones being the Awakening Protocol, which would awake the people and rise the sanctum. Another option would be to amplify the emergency signal and give correct coordinates, make sure this place is overrun by the RPR models roving in the surface.[br/]We are at a decisive moment.
我们继续深入墓穴，发现自己正处于这座建筑的中心。我们可以在这里控制这座设施的许多功能，其中最重要的一项就是“唤醒协议”，唤醒沉睡在这个圣殿中的人。我们也可以选择放大紧急信号，从而给出正确的坐标，确保这个地方的由 RPR 模型完全掌控。[br/]做出决定的关键时刻到了。

We run the Awakening Protocol and follow the procedure with ease. The people in the pods slowly rise and welcome us as their leader, their heir. They tell us that even though we do not share their entombment, we share their culture. To awake to that rather than to some horrible creatures is a blessing in itself. They grant us control over the Sanctum and ready a deployment to serve us.
我们十分轻松地启动了唤醒协议并执行了规定程序，休眠舱里的人陆续醒来，把我们视为他们的领袖和他们的继承者。他们告诉我们说，虽然我们并不属于这里，但我们拥有共同的文化。所幸我们唤醒的不是什么恐怖的生物，光是这一点就足以使我们欣慰不已。他们给予了我们整座圣殿的控制权，并且随时待命听从我们的调遣。

We run the Awakening Protocol and the people in the pods slowly rise. They are initially distrustful, but our artful diplomacy wins them over. They grant us control over the Sanctum and give us a deployment ready to serve.
我们启动了唤醒协议，休眠舱里的人逐渐醒了过来。他们起初对我们怀有戒心，但我们运用外交手段赢得了他们的信任。他们给予了我们整座圣殿的控制权，并随时待命听从我们的调遣。

As we run the Awakening Protocol, we make a mistake in the pressure management of the Essence valves. Suddenly the whole facility shakes: The reservoirs burst and are now destroyed. The people of the Sanctum are not happy to awake to this but we manage to calm them down. We gain control over the Sanctum, and a few Heritors stick with us, but the majority of their people leave.
在启动唤醒协议的过程中，我们在控制精华阀门的压力时出现了纰漏。突然，整个设施开始摇晃起来：储液器爆裂开来，全部遭到了破坏。圣殿里的沉睡者对这样的苏醒方式十分不满，但我们设法使他们冷静了下来。我们控制了圣殿，但只有少数继承者愿意追随我们，大多数人都选择了离开。
Power the auxiliary facilities of the Awakening Protocol
为唤醒协议的辅助设施供能

We charge the secondary controller of the facility and it guides us through the awakening. The Protocol goes without a hitch and the people quickly awaken. They take us in high regard for our effective strategy and grant us control over the Sanctum, as well as a deployment to serve our cause.
我们为设施的辅助控制器供上了能源，并在它的帮助下开启了唤醒协议。程序顺利进行，人们很快苏醒了过来。他们对我们的高效策略深表敬意，将圣殿的控制权给予了我们并加入了我们的事业。
Amplifying the signal for the RPR…
正在为 RPR 放大信号…

We don’t really care for these people and their slumber, so we decided to amplify the signal and call down the RPR. The slaughter is cruel and vicious as the ancient reapers destroy the slumbering bodies and arks. This Sanctum shall never rise again. The RPR go motionless after the destruction is done, as if waiting for something. Our team quickly figures they are waiting orders and think we are their age old admins.
我们其实并不在乎这些沉睡者，因此我们决定放大信号让 RPR 能够找到这里。这些恶毒而残忍的古老刽子手将沉睡者的躯体和方舟悉数摧毁，这座圣殿也将不复存在。RPR 在完成破坏后一动不动地停在原地，似乎在等待着什么。我们迅速意识到它们是在等待我们的指令，看来它们已经把我们当成了昔日的管理员。
Stabilizing the rift into a Phase Manipulator module…
正在将裂缝稳定在一个相位操纵器模块中…
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.
